You only need to upgrade if you want to use export feature with reporting period longer than 1 week. -------------> Then please explain this: Why does "MY" downloaded app say "TRIAL Version?"  The dictionary says a TRIAL is "The act of [testing] something" and "A trial of something to see if or how it works."  Explain this and I'll re-evaluate with more stars, because it appeared to be a good app..

I have been using this app for over 6 months now and it is in my opinion the best of type for recording not only my blood glucose but also my blood pressure. The at a glance calendar has proven very useful in my doctors appointments and the option to print a report is also very welcome.  The app has an active developer who was very open to suggestions, many of which came with the regular updates. It was good when I first started using it, it is great now with the steady improvements with all my data still accessible from the time I started, giving me a permanent record of all my home measurements.

title: Cornerstones4Care® diabetes app
description:
Cornerstones4Care® Powered by Glooko is a free diabetes management app that can track your blood sugar, medicine, meals and activity all in one place.  Cornerstones4Care® Powered by Glooko syncs readings from your meter, to make blood sugar tracking easier, and offers educational content on healthy eating and lifestyle choices that can help you better manage your diabetes.  Install the app and activate your account to receive a Welcome Kit at no cost that contains the accessories you need to sync your device data to the app.
 
FEATURES:
- Automated blood sugar and exercise tracking: sync readings from 80+ blood glucose meters, insulin pumps and continuous glucose monitors (CGMs) and popular activity trackers including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Strava and Moves.
- Insights on your blood sugar trends: learn what time of day your blood sugar levels may go high or low, if they are more (or less) likely to be under control on certain days of the week, and how they compare to previous time periods.
- Charts and graphs: see how your food, medication and activity impact your blood sugar levels.
- Extensive food and medication database: makes it easy to log your food and medication intake.
- Reminder notifications: set reminders to check your blood sugar, take medication or any other action.
- Educational information on food, exercise and lifestyle choices, at the right time and place.
 
Cornerstones4Care® Powered by Glooko is offered free of charge to users.  By using the app, users agree to share their data with Novo Nordisk for research and product development purposes.  The Cornerstones4Care® Powered by Glooko app is for informational purposes only and is not intended to replace a discussion with a health care provider.
 
COMPATIBILITY:

title: ReliOn Life
description:
Our new ReliOn™ Life Patient Mobile App is a free tool for ReliOn™ meter users to track their blood sugar readings, activity, diet, and mood.

You choose what to log and how much detail to add. Add context to your logs with optional note details or share your blood glucose readings with your healthcare provider. Find patterns by digging deeper into your reading history to understand ways to adjust your diabetes management.

ReliOn™ Life is only compatible with the following ReliOn™ blood glucose meters: Premier BLU, Premier VOICE, Premier CLASSIC, Confirm, Compact, and Prime.

title: Glooko - Track Diabetes Data
description:
Glooko is the universal diabetes management platform that helps you understand how food, activity, and medication affect your glucose levels - now available at no cost (a one-time hardware fee may apply for users who are not part of a sponsored program)!

Glooko syncs diabetes data from your blood glucose (BG) meter, insulin pump and/or continuous glucose monitor (CGM), and lets you easily track your medication, food and lifestyle data. The Glooko app is compatible with most BG meters, insulin pumps, and CGMs available in the market. See www.glooko.com/compatibility/ for a complete list of compatible devices.

You can also share your reports with your healthcare provider, so they can make informed changes to your care plan and support you in-between office visits.

POPULAR FEATURES:

- Sync readings from 80+ BG meters, insulin pumps and CGMs to create an automatic logbook.
- Create insightful graphs and charts that show how your glucose is affected by insulin, carb, and activity.
- View your glucose trends in multiple ways: chronologically, by periods in the day, week or month, or compare time periods for insight into your BG trends.
- Sync data automatically from popular activity trackers such as Fitbit, Apple Health, Strava, and Moves to see activity data.
- Add foods using the built-in barcode scanner to log your carb intake
- Set reminders to check BG, take medications or anything else you want to be reminded about.

comments: This app has lots of features, but it's buggy and slow. It's the only app that syncs omnipod data and daughter's endocrinologist basically requires that we use it. But it's very hard to find food history to see how to adjust dosing. Food items in the database do odd things when you change serving sizes. Syncing is largely unreliable and often comes a couple of days late. With all of Insulet's money behind this app, I'd expect it to be lots better.

title: Type 2 Diabetes: Lifestyle & BG by Nourishly
description:
If you have Type 2 Diabetes or Pre-Diabetes this app will help you make lifestyle changes that you know you need to do but find it hard to do.

Built with input from leading dietitians, psychologists and researchers, this free and HIPAA compliant app puts "what works" for diabetes management in your pocket:

☆  Easily log blood glucose, meals, medication, physical activity, and stress
☆  Learn how these things affect your blood sugar levels
☆  Link with your care team for data sharing and feedback
☆  Discover easy (and tasty) diabetes meal plans
☆  Over 100 science backed micro-missions to master!

6 Reasons why you should give it a try:

1. Link with your care team: Turbo charge the care you receive by linking with your Dietitian, Nutritionist, Psychologist, Doctor, Social Worker, Health Coach or Nurse Practitioner for insight-driven care and feedback both in AND out of the clinic. 

2. Personalized meal, blood glucose, activity and symptom trackers: You are multi-dimensional, and so should be your trusted tracker! Break free from stock-standard glucose monitoring with integrated symptom, mood, meal and activity tracking. 

3. Stress free and flexible meal planning: Pick from expert curated weekly diabetes meal plans, create your own, or link with your nutrition expert for a plan personalized for you. 

4. 100 Science-backed missions to choose from: Gradually master proven habit-hacks for diabetes that can help avoid blood sugar spikes and dips, and regulate your body weight.

5. Celebrate wins with rewards: Be surprised and delighted by beautiful, funny and thought provoking reflection images and affirmations.

6. Coping skills for when you get stuck: Take advantage of 200+ skills to unstick yourself when mental blockers, negative-self talk, lethargy and anxiety strike.

title: GLog: Glucose Logbook for Diabetics
description:
GLog is a logbook for diabetics to track their health information.

You can use GLog to track your blood sugar, weight, blood pressure, A1c and cholesterol levels.  You can share this information with your doctor by email and visualize it with charts.

Key Features:

-	Quickly record blood glucose, weight, blood pressure, A1c and cholesterol readings
-	Set a time period (After Lunch, Before Dinner etc.) for your blood glucose readings
-	View charts for Blood Glucose, Weight and Blood Pressure
-	Charts have Day, Week and Month Views
-	Email readings to your doctor in Excel or CVS format.
-	Export data to your Android file system.
-	Set custom date range for exported records
-	Select what type of data is exported

If you have any questions, contact us at support@stelladomus.com.

summary: Tracks blood glucose, weight, A1c and more. With charts and email export.
recentChanges:
What's new in version 1.2
• Recording values in mmol/L, kilograms, and mmol/mol is now supported. Go to settings to select alternate units.
• Pulse can now be recorded with your blood pressure.
• A statistics page has been added that will give minimum, maximum and average readings.
comments: FINALLY! my dr wanted me to keep a log for a week of food and BG because i had to go off my Lantus as it was giving me too many low lows. I have no appetite. I blame this on being stuck at home 24/7 because of covid. I was taking 60 units a day. Dropped it to 30 units and now none. So i tried at least a dozen apps. This one fits what i need. Plain and simple, easy to use. Thank you.

Thank you, I love this App it works on all levels no issues easy to use and it's free unlike others who charge you to use certain parts. I do recommend the app you won't be sorry. Thank you so much again for making my life easier.

Easiest Blood Glucose Logbook that I have used ⭐ Best out of six so far ⭐ BG tracking is super intuitive ⭐ Result entry is ridiculously straightforward ⭐ Excellent choice of entry times ⭐ Results export is flawless ⭐ For folks with non-bluetooth BG meters this app is a must ⭐ I wish that I had tried this app first - would have saved a lot of grief. Thank you for making this excellent app available and thank you for your work and effort in creating it. Very grateful🙏
Great app nice and easy to use. Would be awesome if you could log a note to record what foods you ate etc

This looks great and has everything I want except we must be able to store the readings as we're given them. We need to be able to change the settings from lbs to kg for weight for example. My cholesterol is given to me as xx.xx for example. I want this app but can't use it as it is. I'll keep it installed so I can try future updates though.

title: BP & Glucose Monitor
description:
Mobile application that can read blood pressure and blood sugar levels from conventional blood pressure monitors and glucose meters.

- Automatic reading
Read blood pressure and blood sugar levels from the meter automatically
- Interpretation
Interpret the abnormal results and give basic advice
- Personal Report
Check the past reports of blood pressure and sugar values with graphs

WHY USE BP & Glucose Monitor
Easy to use, just use the phone to look at the screen on a monitor

- Use with any brand of meter that is standard in the market
- Reduce errors from keying of blood sugar and blood sugar values to record

Measure by yourself
1. Measure the blood pressure or measure the sugar from the blood draw at the fingertips.

2. Use a mobile phone to look at the meter screen, the program will automatically change the picture from the screen to a number.

3. Press to confirm your identity and the measured value.

4. Save measurement results in the phone.



*** Support display in 2 languages: Thai and English


แอปพลิเคชันที่สามารถอ่านค่าความดันโลหิตและระดับน้ำตาลในเลือด จากเครื่องวัดความดันโลหิต  และเครื่องวัดน้ำตาลทั่วไป แล้วแปรผลค่า พร้อมให้คำแนะนำพร้อมเสียงโดยอัตโนมัติ

BP & Glucose Monitor ทำอะไรได้บ้าง ?
- อ่านค่าความดันโลหิต และระดับน้ำตาลในเลือดจากเครื่องวัดฯ โดยอัตโนมัติ 
- แปลผลความผิดปรกติ และให้คำแนะนำพร้อมเสียงเบื้องต้น    
- ตรวจสอบรายงานย้อนหลังค่าความดันโลหิต และค่าน้ำตาล พร้อมแสดงเป็นกราฟ


ทำไมต้องใช้  BP & Glucose 
- ใช้งานง่าย เพียงใช้โทรศัพท์ส่องที่หน้าจอเครื่องวัดความดันโลหิตหรือน้ำตาลในเลือด
- ใช้กับเครื่องวัดฯ ยี่ห้อใดๆ ที่ได้รับมาตรฐานในท้องตลาด
- ลดความผิดพลาดจากการคีย์ค่าความดันและค่าน้ำตาลในเลือดด้วยมือ

วิธีการใช้งาน
1. วัดความดันโลหิต หรือวัดค่าน้ำตาลจากการเจาะเลือดปลายนิ้ว   
2. ใช้มือถือส่องที่หน้าจอเครื่องวัดฯ โปรแกรมจะเปลี่ยนรูปภาพจากหน้าจอเป็นตัวเลขค่าให้อัตโนมัติ
3. กดยืนยันตัวตน และค่าที่วัดได้
4. บันทึกค่าในโทรศัพท์ 



AI INNOVATION JUMPSTART BATCH2

title: GlucoMen Day CGM: Real-Time Glucose Monitoring
description:
The GlucoMen Day CGM App serves as the display for the GlucoMen Day Continuous Glucose Monitor (CGM). Contact your healthcare professional for information about the GlucoMen Day CGM System.

Real-time glucose 
• Real-time glucose readings displayed every minute.
• Glucose values are color-coded to highlight high and low values based on user-defined limits.
• Drag your finger on the Home screen trend chart to view individual glucose readings.

Trends
• A trend arrow indicates whether glucose is currently increasing, decreasing, or steady.
• Home screen trend chart shows glucose readings for the last 1, 3, 6, 12, or 24 hours.
• Rotate the Home screen to landscape orientation to view a full-screen trend chart.

Alerts
• Customizable alerts warn when glucose is urgently low, low, high, rapidly increasing, or rapidly decreasing.
• Predictive alerts warn when glucose will be high or low within 15 minutes.
• Additional alerts indicate when it's time to calibrate, when the transmitter battery is low, when the sensor signal is lost, and when the smartphone is almost out of space.

Calibration
• Calibrate by manually entering a blood glucose reading taken on a blood glucose meter or selecting a reading taken on a connected GlucoMen Day METER.
• Calibration required once a day after initial setup.

Reports
• Review your CGM session with a glucose overview report (PDF) covering the past 3, 7, 14, or 28 days.
• Export your glucose and trend data to a CSV file that can be analyzed in various software applications.

GlucoMen Day METER compatibility
• Connect your GlucoMen Day METER to the app to simplify calibration.
• Readings taken on the GlucoMen Day METER appear on the calibration screen and can be selected when calibrating the system.

Connected Partners
• Connect to GlucoLog web to automatically sync data from the app.

Device compatibility
• The GlucoMen Day CGM App is compatible with select Android devices.

-- Google --

Compatible devices:
- Pixel: 7.0, 7.1, 8.1, 9.0, 10.0
- Pixel XL: 7.0, 7.1, 8.1, 9.0, 10.0

Devices that have not been tested but are likely to be compatible:

title: Glucose Control
description:
***

YOU NEED TO HAVE A GLUCOMETER (The app DOES NOT measure the blood levels, nor the phone will measure your blood levels, it DOES NOT work like this).

Please, do not rate the app if you think that by means of the phone you are going to measure the blood levels, that does not exist.

***

Glucose Control is an application that is created and designed to be a great help tool for people of any age, taking control of the glucose levels of a person with diabetes.

With this application you can add:

* The glucose level data.
* Set up alarms so you do not forget to take your medication.
* Record your lab tests and/or medical tests.
* Information of allowed and not allowed foods for a diabetic person.
* Feeding tips among others.
* You can see in a graph, the behavior of your blood sugar levels according to your aggregated data.
* Informative table of glucose values for diabetic and prediabetic people.
* It also contains the possibility of taking control of several users, at the same time!.
* You can create a profile for a diabetic and prediabetic person.
* You can even export all your data in an Excel and send them to the people you want, including your doctor.

We assure you that it will be a great tool for glucose control.

If you have any problem or suggestion on how to improve it, do not hesitate to write us from the "comments or suggestions" section or an email to help.lehreer@gmail.com. Thank you!

title: Blood Sugar Checker / Blood Glucose Tracker
description:
This is the health utility application for those user that might have been suffering from diabetes.


The application is designed to keep the complete track record of the user’s Blood Sugar. User can enter the Blood Glucose reading in application, the application will indicate that whether your Blood Glucose is normal, high or low. Best app for recording Blood Sugar readings MG/DL, MMOL/L & pulse rate. 


The user can share these records with his/her doctor, user can export the records and create reports in various forms. Enter your Blood Sugar values first and press on save. The glucose diary will allow you to track your regular hemoglobin, sugar (glucose) levels, pressure, insulin, and also add tags, medications, condition, and weight to each record.

title: Diabetes Logbook - Blood Glucose Tracker
description:
Diabetes logbook is a blood glucose tracker that provides you an easy and meaningful solution to log your blood glucose levels and other health indicators to support diabetes self-management.

Mission: Our goal is to provide digital support for diabetes self-management to the diabetes community worldwide. Our mission is to extend our support to 10 million people by the end of 2020.

Diabetes self-management is a full time and a lifelong process. Diabetes patients need support and education to manage their condition. Diabetes logbook provides educational support at each step of the process from within the app. 

Diabetes logbook, in addition to being a blood glucose tracker, is an educational tool that provides the user instant educational support and rationale of tracking these indicators. It explains why we are tracking and provide educational support there and then.

App features

•	Blood glucose tracking at wake-up (fasting), before meal, after meals and bedtime.
•	Tracking other related parameters like A1C, weight
•	Tracking medication
•	You can count your carbs in your food
•	Weekly & monthly averages
•	Comprehensive Graphs displaying your long term picture of your glucose trends
•	You can set your high and low targets as advised by your doctor.
•	Setting units – US units (mg/dL) or International units ( mmol/L)
•	Set reminders for checking your blood sugar check or other readings 
•	Share your data with your friends, family or with your doctor in the next appointment. You can also print it in PDF format.

• Tracking other related parameters like A1C, weight
• Tracking medication
• You can count your carbs in your food
• Weekly & monthly averages
• Comprehensive Graphs displaying your long term picture of your glucose trends
• You can set your high and low targets as advised by your doctor.
• Setting units – US units (mg/dL) or International units ( mmol/L)
• Set reminders for checking your blood sugar check or other readings
• Share your data with your friends, family or with your doctor in the next appointment. You can also print it in PDF format.

title: Diabetic's Logbook
description:
The Diabetic's Logbook was developed to help you monitor your diabetes. It makes tracking your blood glucose levels, insulin intake and food consumption both convenient and simple. You can explore and analyze your data with the help of informative graphs as well as generate and share detailed reports.

Features include:

- Simple user interface
- Record blood glucose readings, insulin doses and meals
- Upload images to augment records
- Review and edit logs
- Generate daily, weekly and monthly graphs
- Generate and share detailed reports via e-mail and Skype

title: My Sugar Diary-Diabetes App
description:
This diabetes app has been designed and developed for quick and easy tracking of daily blood glucose levels to help in easy diabetes management. 


This app supports following features:

- Add, modify or delete daily blood sugar levels, time when test was done, meals and insulin dosage with remarks
- View history for specific date range and analyze them using pie charts, tables and statistics
- Statistics provide min, max and average blood sugar, average insulin dosage and estimated HbA1c value
- Supports mmol/L and mg/dL format
- Allows user to set their own blood glucose target values
- Uses color coding to depict high, low and normal values
- Creates report in MS Excel format that can be shared with others

We'd love to hear your feedback to grow this diabetes app further :)

comments: This is a good app, it helps me stay on top of my daughter blood sugar levels.
Excellent app to monitor insulin and food intake.
I love this app. But have to rate it a 3 star at the moment since it crashes on a fresh install on my phone. I didn't have any problems with it on my old phone.

Love this app. It helps to keep track of all my daughters numbers. It also gives a near spot on A1C calculation. Would recommend for anyone that needs to keep track of blood sugar levels. Just one question, is this available for laptop/pc?

I like this app, it is fairly simple to use and the analysis tools are easy to understand. (I'm a Type 2 who doesn't take meds or insulin..)  However there is a drawback, the app is set up so you can only input values before & after each meal. It does NOT allow for more frequent testing .There is no way to input additional readings.   Today I tested to see  if I peak  2 hrs after a meal or if my blood glucose peaks earlier or later. I tested, 1 hour after a meal, 2 hours after & 3 hours after. There is no way of entering these additional readings into this app (unlike other apps.) I know other people with diabetes who test at bedtime & during the night because they have dawn phenomena (a rise on waking) Some Type 2s test for low blood sugar if they suspect a medication is lowering their blood sugar too much. . As well, Type 1 diabetics often test before exercise, if they suspect hypoglycemia & before driving (driving too low a glucose level is dangerous.)  Therefore I cannot recommend this app for any Type 1s. For Type 2s, I'd only recommend it for those who don't take any meds (other than metformin) or insulin.

title: SmartLog
description:
The SmartLog app (application) is designed as an accessory to the i-SENS Blood Glucose Monitoring System and is intended to help users track and monitor their blood glucose levels by providing the following features.
(1) Transfer data from your meter to your mobile phone. (OTC cable, NFC)
(2) Analyze data using various graphs.
(3) Meal, insulin, medications and other information can be added and stored manually.
(4) Share your blood glucose data and other health information with your healthcare provider via email, SMS and Push.

* Measurements downloaded on to the application from the meter in mmol/L units may have a difference of +/- 0.1mmol/L depending on the calculation method of below hundredths decimal points.

title: Diabetes Plus
description:
Developed by diabetics for diabetics. DiabetesPlus lets you administer your readings on your device and saves time by enabling you to send the data directly to your doctor. You are also able to print the export with your airprint-printer or export it directly into your dropbox. 

Administer your blood glucose (mg/dl and mmol/l), your dosage of insulin, carbohydrates, sport activities, blood pressure, pulse, weight and notes simple and effective. DiabetesPlus is aware of insulin pump users and lets you administer your basalrates and insulin pump events. 
Also other medication is easily tracked. Just add them in the settings menu.
Generate pdf-files with all relevant data within seconds and email them to your doctor or directly put them into your dropbox.

Recommended by Diabetes Center Hamburg West. 

Features: 
- Administration of measurements: blood glucose (mg/dl and mmol/l), dosage of insulin, carbohydrates, sport activities, blood pressure, pulse, weight and notes
- Administration of basalrates and insulin pump events for insulinpump users
- Save insulin values with a minimum value of 0,1 IU and carbs with a minimum of 0,5 carbs  
- Define your glucose target range
- Clear illustration due to coloured indicators
- Daily and monthly line graphs of your blood glucose
- Graphical reporting of target values
- Calculation of important statistics (average blood glucose, HbA1c, average dosage of insulin (short and long acting insulin), average carbohydrates)
- PDF-Export designed like the known diabetes diarys 
- Email pdf to your doctor or yourself
- Export the pdf directly into your dropbox
- Enhance the report with your personal data (name, date of birth)
- Selection of your insulines (short and long acting) in settings

title: Blood Sugar Tracker & Monitor
description:
Log your blood sugar test(Glucose test) results.
Log your body weight and track it on the dashboard.
You don't have to save hard copies of lab records any more
Blood sugar tracker shows the graphs of fluctuations in your blood sugar levels
Also shows useful information on blood glucose levels

Blood sugar tracker is very useful app for diabetic patients and also for those who wants to monitor blood glucose levels quite often.  Just log your blood sugar levels after every test and keep monitoring through graphical reports.  Blood sugar tracker  also shows you important information about Blood Glucose Levels on 'info' page which will help you know what are the healthy blood sugar levels.

Blood Sugar Tracker shows the graphs of  fluctuations in your blood sugar through graphs.  You can view Random, Fasting and A1C blood sugar levels through separate graphs.

Blood sugar tracker will keep all your history of test results which is very useful for your periodic  doctor visits. You don't have to worry about keeping those hard copies of your blood sugar test reports.

title: Sugar Checking App
description:
Sugar Checking App is useful for someone who often checks their blood sugar levels. Sugar Checking App offers you an easy way of logging your blood sugar values in one place and analyse it through graphs.

High blood sugar is commonly known as hyperglycemia. Type 2 diabetes has become a global epidemic but that it’s not just preventable but also reversible. While some of us are genetically at a risk of diabetes Type 2, it is largely a lifestyle disorder. By changing your lifestyle you can learn how to lower your blood sugar levels naturally without any medication.
Most of diabetes medications are nothing more than a temporary relief. They don’t address the underlying reason behind high blood sugar, which is driven by the environment. Diet and lifestyle changes can reverse diabetes unlike medications which can only treat the symptoms.

Make a positive changes to the way you eat, sleep, stay active, and manage stress.

Summary of features of the Sugar Checking App :

* Add your blood sugar readings.
* Shows History of all your logs.
* Shows graph of your blood sugar fluctuations.
* Find nearest hospitals to you.

title: Blood sugar diary App - Insulin
description:
This is the first version of our blood sugar diary for free in and it already offers you a lot of features. If you have any suggestions for improvement then please let us know first, instead of making a bad review.

Features:
- With the insulin diary you can record your blood sugar at different times of the day with the insulin units as well as write a comment.
- The blood sugar (glucose) can be stored either in mmol/l or mg/dl.
- A blood glucose converter is also integrated.
- Your insulin data can be printed or exported as CSV or Excel file
- Also you can send the CSV/Excel file as email attachment
- A statistic of blood glucose data (even after event) can also be displayed. For example whether in the morning or in the evening.
- A backup of the database can be saved.
- Dark Mode / Dark Mode can be activated or the dark mode will be automatically activated from the energy saving settings. Supports Android Q too

Further features and improvements will follow.

title: CONTOUR DIABETES app (US)
description:
The new CONTOUR™DIABETES app syncs with a CONTOUR connected meter for seamless blood glucose (BG) monitoring. This easy-to-use app can give you a better understanding of how your daily activities affect your BG results to help you manage your diabetes. 

In addition to using the Contour®Diabetes App, always consult with your Health Care Professional before making any changes to your diet, exercise or treatment regimen.

Most people with diabetes know that logging blood glucose (BG) results after taking blood samples can be inconvenient and time-consuming. But now, with the new CONTOUR DIABETES app, you can easily and conveniently capture all your BG readings to help you manage your diabetes, smarter.

The CONTOUR®DIABETES app presents your BG results in a simple and easy-to-review way that’s personalized to you.

Download the CONTOUR®DIABETES app today, so you can receive meaningful information on how you are progressing, with some of the latest easy-to-use features…

•	My Patterns – helps you identify trends in your blood glucose results and notifies you of potential causes to help you understand your diabetes in a new light
•	Test Reminder Plans – let you optimize your testing regime to give you results that are more insightful
•	Record – events such as diet, activities and medication, and also add photos, notes or voice memos to help put your results in context
•	View – if you use insulin and/or log your carbs, you can now see your insulin doses, carb intakes and blood glucose results in one simple view
•	Share – give your healthcare professional greater insight with the easy-to-read diary report – send this report in advance or take it with you on the day of your appointment

Learn more about the new CONTOUR DIABETES app and CONTOUR connected meters at:
 www.contourone.com
Compatibility.contourone.com

Note: Screenshots are for illustration purposes. Availability of blood glucose meter model based on country of purchase.  Units of measurement in the app will match that of your synced meter. For more information, please refer to the user guide for your CONTOUR connected meter.

After the last update the app won't open. Uninstalled and reinstalled and app opens now but won't accept the email and new password. I used the password to log in to the website but it the app won't accept it. Okay I leaned that website is not connected to the app. Customer service helped me change the app password and it works great again.

It's really great that let the consumer know that test strip are still available. However, the notification keeps popping up everytime you try to navigate the app. It is very annoying. Also setting it up was very difficult.
A week ago and for the last few years this has been a 5 star app. After the last update it won't open. How about instead of asking us each individually to contact support, you just fix the app.
Normally app is great. Since the last update, the app will not open. Tried to Uninstaller and reinstall the app and still had the issue. Need a new update to fix this bug!

title: Dexcom Follow
description:
The Dexcom Follow app is part of the Dexcom SHARE® system. 

Use this app if your loved one is sharing data from their Dexcom CGM app.  The Sharer will need to send an invitation to allow you to connect after you have installed the Follow app.

Dexcom Follow is the perfect companion to your loved one’s Dexcom CGM, connecting you to those nearest and dearest to you, even when they’re far away. Through secure wireless connections, Dexcom Follow allows you to view and follow the glucose levels, trends and data of your loved ones.

Whether you have a child who is in college, an elderly parent who lives in another state, or a spouse who is going on a business trip, Dexcom Follow is there to keep you connected and informed. 

With Dexcom Follow, you can:
•	Monitor your loved one’s glucose activity at school or across the country.
•	Receive glucose information from up to 10 different Sharers – children, friends, or other loved ones.
•	Respond quickly with the help of customizable glucose alerts and push notifications that can inform you when a Sharer’s glucose levels are outside the norm.

Customer Reviews

This app store should not be used as your first point of contact to resolve technical or customer services issues. In order to protect your privacy and personal information, and promptly resolve any technical or customer services issues you are having with any Dexcom product, please contact 1-888-738-3646.

Dexcom is required to follow up with customers regarding product-related complaints. If 
Dexcom determines that your comment/complaint requires follow up, a technical support representative will attempt to contact you to gather more information regarding your comment/complaint.

recentChanges: Performance enhancements and bug fixes.
comments: I installed the app and set the notifications. I believe it has worked three times in the 8 months I've been trying to use it. It typically just displays "No Data" with an error message. Customer service said it's because I have a newer phone. Since that contact, a new version of my phone has come out and the app still doesn't work. You need to get your developers to stay ahead of technology, not trying to catch up. This does zero good for to help me help my loved one.

Follow app has not been functioning properly since November 2019. It was partially fixed in December but the persistent issue is no matter what the settings are on, the alarm will sound every 5 minutes, even when opened/cleared, until blood sugar falls back into range. For a high glucose reading for example I have it set to alert me every hour because the insulin takes time to kick in when correcting a high blood sugar but it goes off every 5 minutes. PLEASE HELP!!! Yeah, still not fixed. 10/15

In general a good app but since the October 2020 Android patch though, both my wife's pixel 4a and my Pixel 3 stopped getting audible alerts when do not disturb is on, even though the follow app is and has been put as an exception. It was working properly with the do not disturb and still alerting prior to this. Just got off the phone with dexcom support who was not very friendly and basically told I was out of luck and that my Android 11 software wasn't compatible. Please help Dexcom!!!

This app is basically for entertainment value only. It's very unreliable, don't expect to be updated on a regular basis, in fact don't expect updates on an irregular basis. It just doesn't work. if you are planning to use this app in a life or death situation it will probably end up as a death situation. Look elsewhere if you can. My wife is a type 1 diabetic and 95% of time I do not have access to her blood glucose levels.

So far unimpressed. I'm attempting to monitor my child. It's bad enough I can only be a "follower" as opposed to being a user on the actual G6 app, not being able to have multiple sets of alerts is getting aggravating. His range isn't supposed to be the same at night as it is during the day, but I keep getting alerts because it's above his daytime range. I'll have to turn everything off in order to get any sleep and that defeats the purpose. That, or change the settings multiple times a day. 👎

title: Diabetes Connect
description:
With Diabetes Connect you have your diabetes under control at all times, regardless of where you are. Simply sign in and your documentation is a snap!

By diabetics - for diabetics.

Now you can record all your diabetes-related data fast and easy and create all your documentation with just a few clicks. Blood sugar, meals, insulin injections, medication and many more can be tracked with Diabetes Connect while all your data is always in your pocket. Everything you don't need can be turned off, so everything stays nice and neat.

Your values can be synced over multiple devices, handing you an up to date documentation - wherever you are. You can also access your data over our web portal and create your exports and statistics there.

Nice and clear graphics and statistics help to get a perfect overview of your current diabetes therapy.
For your next doctor's appointment, your values can be exported into a well-formed PDF-file.

Functions:
- Administer all your diabetes-data
- Suitable for Type1- and Type2-Diabetics
- Support for mg/dl and mmol/l
- Track your meals as bread units, carbohydrate units or carbohydrates
- Get important medical staticstics right in the app
- Synchronisation over multiple devices

recentChanges:
Version 2.5
- Labels can now be sorted and deselected in the settings. This way you can only see the labels you need when you create them.
- Information about the archives added.
- Fixed a bug in the archives that sometimes only archived half a day.
comments: Appears good but far too many bugs and flaws - no rotation with the screen, cannot access or change user name or password on the android app. Needs a huge overhaul. The ability to export data to excel would be great.

Full-o-Bugs, Nags. Doesn't follow screen rotation. Got stuck upside down. So much potential but just not working. Tried to take a monthly subscription - perhaps the pro version would be better, but the buggy subscribe dialog didn't work. Sorry, but managing T1D is already enough work, this app is too high maintance. Fail!
I find this app difficult to work with. The information overlaps or is partly offscreen. And its constantly advertising to upgrade at a charge, of course. Im looking for a new app right now.

Where has this been all my life? Its clear, clean, effective, efficient. After mapping this app to my bixby key I can log my entries in a flash. No fiddling around and wasting time! 10/10. The free version is magnificent alone, but for how efficient this app is and how much use I get out of it, the lifetime fee is absolutely worth it for the full version.

What I love about this app is the fact that when you enter bg values, the app takes into consideration the time of entry (I've used an app in which you can enter time with your bg value, but when it makes timeline, app just assumes that measurements are made at a certain time and it's terrible).

title: Glucose Monitor
description:
A very simple and easy to use app which and can be used by anyone who has a valid email id. Salient features of app are-
1. Allows you to enter your glucose and BP levels for three times a day.
2. Allows you to view your BP and glucose levels for last three months.
3. Graphical view representation.
4. Application sends your monthly reports to the registered email id at the 1st of every month.
5. It has the feature to send your available reports to any email id. 
6. Single user account can be opened on any number of phones, provided one enters email id and pin.
7. No permissions required, apart from internet.

title: Dexcom G6
description:
Always know your glucose number and where it’s heading with the Dexcom G6 and G6 Pro Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) Systems –indicated for diabetes treatment decisions with zero fingersticks and no calibration.*

*Fingersticks required for diabetes management decisions if symptoms do not match 
readings.

Only use this app if you have the Dexcom G6 or G6 Pro CGM Systems. 
 
With Dexcom G6 and G6 Pro CGM Systems, always know your glucose number with just a quick glance at your compatible smartphone or smartwatch.  For a list of compatible devices visit www.dexcom.com/compatibility.  Dexcom G6 and G6 Pro provide real-time glucose readings for patients with type 1 or type 2 diabetes every five minutes. Dexcom G6 and G6 Pro are indicated for children age 2 years and older.

The Dexcom G6 and G6 Pro Systems provide personalized trend alerts right on your smart device and lets you see when your glucose levels are going too low, or too high, so you can better manage your diabetes. The Alert Schedule** feature lets you schedule and customize a second set of alerts.  For example, you can set the schedule to match your work hours and have different alert settings during the rest of the day.  Custom alert sounds are available, including a Vibrate-Only option on the phone for glucose alerts other than the Urgent Low Alarm.

The Always Sound** setting allows you to receive certain Dexcom CGM Alerts even if your phone sound is off, set to vibrate, or in Do Not Disturb mode. This will allow you to silence calls or texts but still receive audible CGM Alerts, including Low and High Glucose alert, Urgent Low Soon Alert**, Urgent Low Alarm, and Rise and Fall Rate alerts**. Always Sound** is on by default. A Home screen icon shows you if your Alerts will sound or not.  For safety, three alerts cannot be silenced: Urgent Low Alarm, Transmitter Failure, and Sensor Failure. Please note that when Android phones are on the most restrictive Do Not Disturb setting (Total Silence), you will not receive any audible Alerts, including the Urgent Low Alarm, Transmitter failure, or Sensor failure.

In addition to the accurate performance provided by the Dexcom Sensor, you’ll receive other valuable features: 
•	Share** your glucose data with up to ten followers in real time. Followers can monitor your glucose data and trends in real time on their compatible smart device with the Dexcom Follow** app. Share and Follow functions require an internet connection.
•	Samsung Health and Google Health access so you can share retrospective glucose data with third party apps 
•	Quick Glance allows you to view your glucose data on the lock screen of your smart device
•	A Dexcom CLARITY link on the landscape trend graph lets you easily transition to the CLARITY App to view more information on your glucose trends

**Not available on Dexcom G6 Pro System

Wear OS Integration

•	Activate the Dexcom G6 and G6 Pro Mobile watch face to quickly access your glucose information and trend graph right from your wrist
•	You can view glucose alerts and alarms from your Wear OS watch

The Dexcom G6 Mobile Android App is compatible with select Android devices only.  Visit Dexcom.com/compatibility for more information.

Customer Reviews

This app store should not be used as your first point of contact to resolve technical or customer services issues. In order to protect your privacy and personal information, and promptly resolve any technical or customer services issues you are having with any Dexcom product, please contact 1-888-738-3646.

Dexcom is required to follow up with customers regarding product-related complaints. If Dexcom determines that your comment/complaint requires follow up, a technical support representative will attempt to contact you to gather more information regarding your comment/complaint.

Dexcom is a registered trademark of Dexcom, Inc. in the United States and/or other countries.
 
Android is a registered trademark owned by Alphabet Inc.

recentChanges: Performance enhancements and bug fixes
comments: I got a Samsung 20 and the app didn't work for months. So out of the blue, I decided to get on and it worked! Then not even 5 minutes of it "working" it told me that my device was not compatible. It worked 5 minutes before??? I loved being able to see everything when I had my s9+. It really sucked going back to the receiver, as it isn't as reliable and I tend to forget that more than my phone. Forever wishing the app works again

Needs to be updated. It is not compatible with the Samsung S10+. Prior to using the S10+, I would rate this app as 5 stars. I cannot use it now until they fix this problem. The receiver you get with the Dexcom G6 does not give you as much information as the app does. I was much better able to control my sugar level with the app. Hopefully they will read this review and get on the ball!

Love the whole idea of this monitoring system but i just got a new phone LG velvet 5G and its not compatiable!! Was looking forward to not having to carry around 2 devices. Rolled the dice and hoped it would be supported since this phone just came out a few months ago. I lost! Good deal for the phone but gave up having to carry only one device. Stuck with 2. Hopefully soon there will be an update. Then im sure itll be a 5 star app.

Not compatible with the Samsung Galaxy S20. I asked months ago when it would be compatible with this app and they said they were working on it. Still not compatible and I've had my phone for 7 months. Dexcom please don't leave a generic response about what Android phones are compatible with the app. I don't want an older phone. This app should be compatible. The S20 has been out for over 7 months, what's the hold up?!?!?!?

This app is extremely frustrating to use. Its intentions are good and the platform is pretty good, however the lack of control on the notifications is limited to the point It's almost not even worth having. Give the user more control of the alerts so we don't get notifications every 10 minutes. Pretty sure most people who have this are adults and are serious about their healthcare. This app does not need as much control and notifications it provides.

description:
Blood Glucose Tracker allows to track your blood glucose levels by time. It allows to log blood glucose for past days at different times during the day. This makes easily to store data and see the trends.  It's large font for who easy to read and log their blood glucose anytime!

Features :

title: ACCU-CHEK® Connect App - US
description:
The Accu-Chek Connect App puts diabetes management tools in the palm of your hand. Features of the app include:
•	Automatically transfer blood glucose results from supported Accu-Chek wireless meters – no more written logbooks.
•	Get help with insulin doses with Accu-Chek Bolus Advisor. (Where available - prescription required)
•	Automatically share data and access additional tools with Accu-Chek Connect Online personal account. https://www.accu-chekconnect.com  
•	Share your diabetes information with your healthcare team via your Accu-Chek Connect Online account, email, or text message.
•	Easy to read graphs help identify trends and patterns.
•	Advanced logbook options including: meals (size, carbs, or calories), food images, insulin, exercise, medications, blood pressure, weight, health state, and notes. 
Before installing the latest app version, it is recommended to back up your current data from the Settings menu in the App (Settings > Data Sharing > Backup).
The Accu-Chek Bolus Advisor feature must be activated by your healthcare provider with appropriate information needed for set-up and use.
The Accu-Chek Connect diabetes management app is intended as an aid in the treatment of diabetes. The Accu-Chek Connect diabetes management app provides for electronic download of blood glucose meters, manual data entry, storage, display, transfer, and self-managing of blood glucose and other related health indicators which can be shown in report and graphical format. 
If you need further help with this application, you can find your country’s Accu-Chek customer support contact information at www.accu-chek.com.
Compatible Devices:
https://tools.accu-chek.com/documents/dms/Accu-Chek_Connect_App_Supported_Devices.html
Connect App Instruction Manual: 
https://tools.accu-chek.com/documents/dms/Accu-Chek_Connect_App_Instructions_for_Use_US.html
Version 2.1.9
© 2020 Roche Diabetes Care
Manufacturer:
Roche Diabetes Care GmbH
Sandhofer Strasse 116
68305 Mannheim, Germany
www.accu-chek.com
ACCU-CHEK, ACCU-CHEK CONNECT, and ACCU-CHEK GUIDE ME are trademarks of Roche. All other product names and trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

recentChanges:
• To continue using Bluetooth to transfer data from your Accu-Chek meter, Android may require user to agree to location permissions. If you encounter this problem after upgrading to version 2.1.8.3, please go to the Settings Menu and select "Pair Meter". If prompted, grant location permissions to the app. No need to re-Pair meter.

comments: Just received the unit from Dr. So far unable to pair it with phone. The phone sees it and will pair, but the meter will not reciprocate. It's stuck looking for the phone. The meter stays on 'enter pin number' until it shuts down. Also, the manual talks about using a calibration solution, which was not included. Rapidly losing confidence in the thing. I mean if they didn't bother to ensure the paring works, nor did they provide for its calibration. I'm beginning to wonder what the point is.

Glitchy app, it gives me false readings or doesn't even sync to my phone and i have to manually input my readings. I've used 2 different meters, side by side and both gave my totally different readings this app being the worst. I tested twice within a 15 min time span before breakfast, my other unnamed meter gave me semi the same readings around the same mg/dL but Accu-chek readings both were different the first one was 131 and the other was 106 not 15 minutes later during my fasting.

I'm reading some of the reviews and I'm having similar problems. When it downloads I love the layout the information is easy to review and I wish it did a better job of showing you more than 7 days. The problem is, like others, it's not wanting to forward the information to my phone. It's an ongoing problem I generally work around and reconnect. Now it's been a week of not reconnecting. I've done troubleshooting that's corrected it before and really need to be able to review my numbers.

Easy to use app once connected. The only problem was getting it to actually pair with my device. My phone had no problem seeing and connecting to the meter but when I tried to do it within the app it kept failing. After many tries I finally closed everything and gave up. Came back a short time later and tried again then it magically worked. It's only been a couple days but the info seems to be sent to my phone app seamlessly now. Fingers crossed it keeps working.

The Bluetooth connection has suddenly stopped working. I have restarted the app, repaired the meter with my phone, but to no avail. I set up an online account and never got the confirmation email. UPDATE 8/27/20. I found that the data transfer works if I open the app before taking the reading. Otherwise, seems to be working OK.

title: diasend
description:
Empower yourself through easy access to your diasend® diabetes data. The diasend® Mobile App allows you and your loved ones to easily view and track your diabetes progress right from the palm of your hand.

The diasend® Mobile App lets you easily:
- Check if you are within target range.
- Identify possible patterns to give you better control.
- Upload data from BG meters and connected pens (see compatibility list below)
- See at what times you typically test.
- Combine data from different devices in one report.

The diasend® system, the world’s most compatible diabetes data management system, provides easy uploading and visualization of information from most glucose meters, insulin pumps, CGMs connected pens and a number of activity tracker apps. As a patient, you can upload data either from home (using diasend® Uploader),from your clinic (using diasend® Transmitter),or on-the-go (for some devices, using diasend® Mobile App) –and then view compiled information in a clear and structured way at www.diasend.com. Just like your health care provider. And, with the diasend® Mobile App you get easy access to the very same information –on-the-go! 

Here’s how to get started:

1. Download the app.

2. Start it, login or sign up for your free diasend® account. 

3. If you are using a device from the list below, data can be uploaded straight from diasend® Mobile App. If not, login at www.diasend.com and connect your glucose meter, insulin pump or CGM to the system.

Supported wireless devices:
- Acon On Call Extra Mobile
- Acon On Call Sure Sync
- AgaMatrix WaveSense JAZZ Wireless
- Ascensia Contour Next One
- Ascensia Contour Plus One
- Novo Nordisk NovoPen 6
- Novo Nordisk NovoPen EchoPlus 
- Nipro TRUE METRIX AIR-Roche Accu
- Chek Aviva Connect
- Sanofi MyStar Plus
- GlucoMen Areo-GlucoMen Areo 2K
- GlucoMen Tech

If you have any questions or feedback –please reach out to us at support@diasend.com. 
For a full list of all diabetes devices currently compatible with our system, please visit: https://support.diasend.com

title: Blood Sugar Log
description:
Blood sugar log is very useful for someone who often checks their blood sugar / glucose levels.  Blood sugar log app offers an easy way of logging your blood sugar readings in one place and analyse it through graphs and even print it as a pdf file.

Summary of features of the Blood sugar log :

1) Log or Add your blood sugar readings
2) Modify or delete your existing blood sugar reading or records
3) Shows History or all your logs for the past one year
4) Shows graph of your blood sugar fluctuations with filters
5) Generates pdf file of past one year data

This is fine. But our doctor's instruction for monitoring was for pre-meals so I prefer the apps with 'pre-breakfast', 'pre-lunch', and 'pre-dinner' categories.
I cannot make notes, ads cover the note section. I deleted the ad and a "ad deleted by Google banner covered the note section. If this doesn't stop I will chose another app.
Best yet and the fact you can print excellent easy to use thank you
It doesn't support mmol/L.

title: Diaguard: Diabetes Diary
description:
Diaguard is a free of cost, ad-free and open source app for people with diabetes mellitus.

It replaces the handwritten diary and helps the user to quickly and easily record, evaluate and export his blood sugar and other important data as PDF or CSV. Thanks to the clearly arranged interface, the user always has an overview of his diabetes. The app also provides information on several thousand foods including carbohydrates and other nutrients.

Features

- Quickly and easily track your blood glucose, insulin, carbohydrates, HbA1c, activity, weight, pulse, blood pressure and oxygen saturation
- Customizable units
- Visualize your blood glucose level in a graph
- Detailed logs of your data
- Settings for basal rate, correction factor and meal-bolus-factor
- Food database with thousands of entries
- PDF and CSV export
- Backup
- Reminder
- Estimated HbA1c
- Statistics
- Dark Mode

Open Source

Diaguard hosts its source code on: 
https://github.com/Faltenreich/Diaguard

comments: Underrated – By far the best blood glucose tracking app. Clean, has all the functionality you'll need with no extra bloat unlike other apps. Highly recommended.

This is one of the best diabetic log apps I have tried, really nice & straight forward UI, with a dark theme. However, I have a Bluetooth enabled bs monitor and I'm too used to not manually entering data, so I'll be using another app with bt sync, but I would still recommended this app. Really well done
Very happy with this app, and especially with the privacy aspect. The only improvement I would like to see is that this app should really be open source.
Too many clicks just to enter a blood glucose value.

Can have were I can sort alphabetical order the tags in because I have to have it that way because I have severe Autism, please fix this problem and respond to this message on your app review please 🙏!

title: GLUCOSEZONE
description:
Join us and thousands of others who have taken control and had success with GlucoseZone!

GlucoseZone is a digital therapeutic designed to help you reach your diabetes and exercise goals.

At GlucoseZone we understand that exercise is different for people living with diabetes, starting with the need to check blood sugar. Knowing the challenges of exercise and diabetes allow us to provide the guidance you need and the results want.

Based on your real time blood sugar levels, GlucoseZone provides you with individualized and tailored guidance, education, and support to help you meet the exercise requirement of diabetes management.

GlucoseZone brings you a convenient and customized experience on your phone, tablet, or computer. When you join GlucoseZone, you have the option to consult with a Diabetes Coach who will provide you with the most appropriate path to follow in GlucoseZone based on your individual needs to achieve your goals.

If you are ready to start having success with diabetes and exercise, join us in the GlucoseZone! Try it for free for 7 days, and then pay just $12.99 per month.

comments: I am prediabetic and this app helps me a lot thanks to the team at Glucosezone!

I love GZ. The program (routines of various levels, coaches, variety and options) is effective and so, so, so fun. My busy schedule and long workdays gave always been barriers, but the under 30 minutes makes it easy to get in..no more excuses for me. I have told all my friends and my docs about GlucoseZone; it's an amazing program (with no app issues on my tablet! Thank you!

Can't even get past the basic details. I try to choose my options of medical treatments, and I can't get past the unit basal rate without it telling me there's a zone error, close app and log in again. I've done that 5 times. Still the same. It's a shame because I was recommended this by other t1s, was hoping for it to succeed.

so wanna give this 5 stars but I can't even get past adding my basal rates in. damn shame cause it looks promising. hope you fix it soon . eta; also missing some different insulin. the one I use isn't listed.

I have type 2 diabetes and have been using this app for about a month now. I am seeing a drop in my blood sugar, they have so many workouts to choose from. Great coaches that answer any questions i have. I am so glad I found this community of great people!

title: Blood Sugar Diary
description:
This extensive Blood Sugar Diary provides you all functions you need to record, track and analyze your blood sugar and pulse.
Since this data is very sensitive, we offer you a high level of data protection. Therefore, your health data is stored only where it belongs: on your device!

Key features:
- Offline Modus (You don't need an internet connection)
- High level data protection
- A beautiful design ensures your daily well-being in the app
- Quick and easy capture of your blood sugar and pulse data
- Add notes or tags to your data (for example: after morning workout, forgotten to take medications)
- A great and clear diary for your blood sugar and pulse
- Extensive diagrams and statistics to track your data over long periods of time
- Add events to your calendar and be reminded of them
- Export your data as a CSV-File
- Much information about different blood sugar levels
- No registration needed

Start your personal and free Blood Sugar Diary now!


Disclaimer:
This app is created to provide you a great diary for your blood sugar and pulse and does not measure your blood sugar and pulse. All result values are random generated!

title: Sphygmo Blood Pressure & Blood Glucose
description:
An app designed by doctors to help you collect and manage your blood pressure and blood glucose readings. This app has been created to help you measure your blood pressure and blood glucose accurately using your own home monitor, follow your trends over time, and help your healthcare provider best manage your care.

• Ensure your measurements are performed accurately by following our "how-to" measurement guide.

• Rapidly and efficiently calculate blood pressure and blood glucose averages with our patent-pending Swipe Averaging™ feature. Bring your phone to your next appointment with your physician or pharmacist, and they can use Swipe Averaging™ to quickly and easily assess your readings for clinical decision making.

• Link your readings directly to your healthcare provider or pharmacist, through the Sphygmo Telemonitoring System. Find out more at mmhg.ca/products

• Learn from internationally renowned experts what blood pressure is, about high and low blood pressure, and how blood pressure can best be controlled.

• Sphygmo is the only blood pressure tracking app to be recommended by Hypertension Canada.

• Easily track your blood pressure using any blood pressure monitor. Automatically transmit your readings using a compatible Bluetooth-enabled home BP monitor, or manually enter the value reported by any blood pressure monitor.

• Track your blood glucose using any blood glucose monitor by recording the values in Sphgymo.



The following Bluetooth-enabled blood pressure monitors are supported.

• A&D/LifeSource UA-651BLE
• A&D/LifeSource UA-1200BLE
• A&D/LifeSource UB-1100BLE
• BIOS Protocol 7D MII (BD245)
• Omron BP653
• Omron BP654
• Omron BP761 / BP761CAN
• Omron BP761N / BP761CANN
• Omron BP786 / BP786CAN
• Omron BP786N / BP786CANN
• Omron BP4350
• Omron EVOLV (BP7000)



PRIVACY AND SECURITY: We require users to create an account with an email address and password. This is so that we can help you if you replace your device, want to use multiple devices, or need to recover your password. Otherwise, you can use the app without entering personal information unless you wish to link with your healthcare provider, in which case you will have to complete the profile to allow your provider to identify you. We take security very seriously. Data transmission is encrypted and our medical grade server is located in Ontario, Canada.



MEDICAL DISCLAIMER: The Sphygmo Home app is not intended for the diagnosis of or screening for hypertension or diabetes. Users should be aware that the Sphygmo Home app is an information management service to enable the analysis of blood pressure and blood glucose data and is not intended to be a substitute for the advice of a health care professional. Individuals should always consult their doctor or other qualified health care professional with any questions they may have regarding a medical condition, including any queries or concerns about blood pressure and blood glucose management. You should never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of information transmitted to or contained in your Sphygmo app.

comments: Good app. It connects you with your doctor easily. Funny part is it did not recognize my Omron series 7 device until I tried under name of A & D medical/life source device.
Great for tracking blood pressure and communicating with my doctor. Has made me feel better about where my health is at
Very good and useful application, Good job Doctors for making it easier for your patients👍

Good app. I've only used the manual entry for blood pressure so far. Will test out other features as per need. One issue I found was that I kept clicking on the "Skip Second Measurement" button by mistake when I instead wanted to enter the second measurement. My suggestion is to ask the user for confirmation "Do you wish to skip the second measurement?" before continuing. This will prevent errors in entry. Thanks.

Just started using this. Very simple and easy to use. Just need an edit option for newbies that are learning. For example, my first input was 97 then the next day tried to put in a number over 100 and got an error message when I change it to mg/dL my 97 changed to 1748 OOPs.

title: Tidepool Mobile
description:
Tidepool Mobile is a companion notes app for Tidepool Web, a free web app, where you can see data from your insulin pump, continuous glucose monitor (CGM), and blood glucose meter, all in one place. Create your free Tidepool account at tidepool.org/signup.

As a notes app, Tidepool Mobile allows you to:

* Tag your CGM, pump, and blood glucose meter data with a note for context.
* Track your favorite meals and your regular exercise, and learn from what you see.
* Search for events you've noted before so you can use your data to help you in real-time, like seeing how your glucose responded to a #walk or #popcorn the last time you used that tag.
* Comment on your data. You and your care team can add comments in Tidepool Mobile and see them in context in Tidepool Web’s more comprehensive visualization and, vice versa, any notes you add in Tidepool Web will then show in your Tidepool Mobile app as well.

Tidepool’s suite of tools is compatible with Dexcom, Abbott’s FreeStyle Libre readers, Medtronic, Tandem, Insulet Omnipod, and Animas insulin pumps, as well as many blood glucose meters. Learn more at tidepool.org/devices.

comments: I'm using the Freestyle Libre Android app to track my data since I lost my handheld scanner. But Tidepool doesn't synch with the app. So this is useless.

I feel the app should have a dashboard. You can not see patterns and averages. I think it is basically a "hot mess". I would rather just go through the hassle of inputting my readings in myself on another app so I can my comparisons, see averages (daily, weekly, monthly...) Diabetes is complicated and i don't need my app complicated, too.

I just downloaded it, so I can't say I have much experience with this app. But so far it's INCREDIBLE! This is the perfect app to help you see how Foods react it's 😄 perfect! for any type of diabetic! The only problem I am having is not with the app but with the client. While uploading, it says it cannot find my One Touch Verio IQ meter. I was having problems uploading my Dexcom but it seems to be working now.

Tidepool Mobile is for viewing and adding context to your data, from multiple devices into one report. Contrary to the review by Nate Moore, this is not the uploader tool, which is a software you install on your computer.

Tidepool is committed to making stuff work for you! As far as I know, they're the only guys making diabetes data displays that reach across brands, especially handy when you have a Dexcom cgm and Medtronic pump as I do. This makes my life so much easier, especially being able to add notes to give the story behind my data (illness, bad site, alcohol, etc). I'm forever grateful to this awesome company and the hard working people behind it.

title: iFORA Diabetes Manager
description:
iFORA - Diabetes Manager app designed to make busy lives easier to manage. iFORA comes with advanced mobile technology, sleek interface design, detailed and yet careful data management tools to assist you in better diabetes management. The easy-to-use tools can help you better understand how your blood glucose level interlinks with a positive self-monitoring process through recording, tracking, seeing your diabetes information in statistic trend graphs, target pie charts and exporting data to Fora TeleHealth solution to share with your doctor.

See your glucose variations over the period of 7-14-30 days. With a target goal you can determine how well you have managed over the period of time and seek advises from your doctor. With an extensive FAQ database, you can learn more about the medication that you are taking and how a good diabetes management can be achieve by healthy eating, regular exercise routine and through lifestyle choices. 

Post your screen images on Facebook and by email or share your information with your doctor instantly through ForaCare's advanced TeleHealth solution software.

The app works smoothly with the Diamond Mini and Diamond Voice via Bluetooth connection and iDiamond Blood Glucose Monitoring System to directly connect to an iPhone® or iPod touch®.


Features of the software include:

DATA RECORD 
Note down your activities with each measurement.
Blood glucose results are color coded, with Red for too high, Green for Normal and Yellow for too low.

RECORD LIST
See your results sorted by time.

LOGBOOK
Blood glucose management at a glance! Data is displayed in a weekly format, for AC, PC, night and sleep, with the color coding system making it much easier to see the usual ups and downs of blood glucose level during the week.

TREND GRAPH
Data is organized into an interactive trend chart, where you will be able to connect the dots of 4 different measurement modes to see how the blood glucose level have gone up and down at different times of the day.

STANDARD DAY
Understand your weekly lifestyle! See the glucose readings overlaying on one single graph, in past 7, 14 and 30days. Identify activities that lead to extreme glucose levels.

DIARY
See instantly how insulin dosage, medication, activities and food intake impact your blood glucose levels. The graphs are displayed in a scale of 24-hour period, from midnight to midnight.

Please note:
This application is information recording and self-monitoring tool only and is not intended to diagnose, prevent or recommend treatment for any disease or illness.
Consult your doctor for informed medical advice about your health and more.

This device is of no use to manage one's health. It is fine for day to day testing but useless for managing you condition over time. Bluetooth pairing with Samsung Note4 simply does not work!!
App works great for me. If it does connect right away a phone reboot fixes it everytime.

title: Diabetes control APP
description:
Insulclock helps you managing and mastering your Type 1 and 2 diabetes in an easy and simple way. The Insulclock Diabetes Diary free App is much more than a record book for diabetes data. Try it, so you can see all you can do with it. The Insulclock diabetes App will help you controlling your blood sugar levels, monitoring carbs taken, managing the use of insulin, setting alarms and reminders, on a daily basis. All in an easy and simple way, so diabetes will not be so annoying. Use the Insulclock App for type 1, type 2, or gestational diabetes. It has never been so easy to store all diabetes data. If you want to improve your blood sugar levels, download the Insulclock Diabetes Diary App now.

**NOVELTIES** 

*Reminders for taking oral medication, GLUCAGON expiration date, insulin pick up date at the pharmacy and medical appointments.
*New help system for app configuration.
*Improved chat security with the healthcare team.
*Fixed the detected bugs, what improve the stability of the application.

IMPROVEMENTS IN THE INTERFACE AND IN FreeStyle Libre CONNECTIONS!

NEW COMPATIBLE GLUCOMETERS to make your diabetes management and sugar levels checks easier. 
YOUR GRAPHICS ARE MORE COMPLETE NOW! With insulin injections, blood sugar levels, exercise and meals data.
**Get in contact with your sanitary team with the hat of the application, that easy**
** We have improved the usability of the App with a new menu, more intuitive and easy to use**
** Login with your Google or Facebook account, thus registering in the Insulclock Diabetes Management App will be much easier and faster**

** FUNCTIONALITIES GLUCOMETER AND CONTINUOUS GLUCOSE MONITOR!
With the Insulclock diabetes App you can pair the following glucometers to save your blood sugar levels automatically:
- Menarini- Glucomen Areo 2k (Bar code greater than 500000)
- Menarini- Glucocard SM
- Ascensia- Contour Next One
- Roche- Accu-Check guide
- Others

 MONITOR YOUR INSULIN PEN: Save when, how much and what type of insulin you have used. You can do this automatically with the INSULCLOCK device for your insulin pen.

*SAVE YOUR PHYSICAL ACTIVITY! If you save your exercise with Google FIT, this data will automatically appear in the Insulclock app. Otherwise, you can add this data manually.

Do not miss any detail of your daily life, all data are important when it comes to diabetes.
ALARMS AND REMINDERS! Set reminders to take your insulin, to check your sugar levels after rapid-acting insulin doses, and much more.*Available devices for insulin doses automatic saving:
- Insulclock, a device to monitor the use of the insulin pen.
Insulclock. The universal system for diabetes management.
The Insulclock system collects all the information related to diabetes management for you, making this process easy, fast and safe. Your data always at your fingertips.

**AWARDS**
Project funded by the European Union via H2020
Winners of the IOT STARS AWARD at the Mobile World Congress
Spanish Government Innovative SME
Legal terms https://insulclock.com/en/legal-sistema
 Privacy policy https://insulclock.com/en/privacidad-sistema

title: MedM Diabetes
description:
Blood sugars can be a pain, especially when they are spiking and falling. Establish better diabetic control with MedM Diabetes, a diabetes diary you can keep with just your smartphone. Diabetes diaries are great for observing trends in your blood sugars and deciding how to best treat your diabetes with your doctor’s help. 

MedM lets you manually enter your blood sugars, or it can upload the data straight from your BG meter using Bluetooth. You can also back up your data to the MedM Health Cloud so you can access it anywhere. This app is fully functional without registration online and it works on any smartphone or tablet. It has analytical tools for observing blood sugar trends. Record your blood sugars anywhere, and share them with your doctor anytime. You will notice a huge difference in your blood sugar control. And the best part is, no more dealing with annoying paper records that can be lost!

MedM Diabetes syncs with the following meters:

- Roche Accu-Check Performa Connect
- Contec SXT
- BeeLee BL-XT02
- Fora D15b
- Fora D30f
- Fora D40d
- Fora G31b
- Fora GD40b
- Fora Diamond mini
- Fora MD
- Fora Test'N'Go Voice 
- MyGlucoHealth
- TaiDoc TD-4279
- SyberCare Magic Mirror
- Polytel PWR-08-03/06/09
- SmartLAb Global WnG

So what are you waiting for? Try MedM Diabetes today for better diabetic control.

MedM – enabling connected health!

comments: I'm 50/50 on the sync with my Accu-Chek Guide. Meaning I have to manually input my readings sometimes because of a failed sync, but sometimes it syncs perfectly. Still, it a good, easy to use app. Best if all, it's free and one of the few in the play store that doesn't have ads or in- app purchases.

Excellent and app with different tools helping me keep controlling on my blood sugar. And easy to receive Bluetooth data from my Accu-Check Instant device. Just additional request, if the can add the average for the past 30 days (month) and 90 days (3months) this shall be greatfull helping. Thanks a lot.

Good basic diabetes tracking app. the reason I haven't given it 5 stars, it's because the units keep defaulting back to mg/dl when I set this to the desired mmol/L. Please fix this in the next iteration.
Don't really know. Recognize my Accu Check Guide but that was it. Didn't have any problems with mysugar app so went with that.
Simple use. Please add Accu-chek Instant support. Because my device detected as Accu-chek Guide & can't sync data.

title: Blood Sugar Diary - Health Tracker
description:
Blood Sugar Diary - Health Tracker keeps track of your health factors like blood sugar / glucose level, blood pressure, weight, hemoglobin level. In addition, you can also add tags, mood and breads units taken.

You can view the charts of blood sugar / glucose level, weight, Bread unit taken, blood pressure, mood condition, hemoglobin level. You can view filtered chart data by tags and time.

You can view statistics of Blood sugar / glucose level (minimum, average, and maximum), Blood pressure (minimum, average, and maximum) and weight.

You can export health report in pdf or excel format file. Later you can open, share, and delete these files. You can take backup of your health data on your local device or on google drive. You can restore old health data from backup.

Blood Sugar Diary - Health Tracker app features:
- Keeps track of blood sugar level and other health factors - blood pressure, weight, hemoglobin level etc.
- It can also keep track of tags, mood, breads units taken
- Shows line charts of blood sugar level, weight, bread unit taken, blood pressure, mood condition, hemoglobin level etc.
- Exports health report in pdf or excel files.
- Backup (local and drive) and restore features are also available.
- You can set units of measurements from settings.
- Feasible data settings for tracking health factors.
- You can add notifications or reminders at your specific time and on specific days.

recentChanges:
-- minor bug fixed (when closing activities)
