comments: Love it! You can record your blood sugar, blood pressure,weight and much more all in place. Easy export of PDF and Excel files. It was a breeze to get all my records to my doctor without taking multiple screenshots like with other apps where you have to pay for export. Provides guidelines for normal bp,glucose,weight ranges and you can set your own glucose ranges based on your type. Easy understandable charts with helpful filters . Two thumbs up! Thank you!
Easy to use. Failing to get the pro version though to get rid of the ads.
Useful app and totally free. I have a few feature requests though: -auto back up of data (maybe weekly?) -ability to set daily reminders to take measurements (possibly send notifications)
This has everything I need and more. Easy to use and set up. I wish it had a help function that would explain some of the measurements it can take like bread units.
Excellent application for home use

title: BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info
description:
BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info application controls the blood pressure and sugar levels with multiple built in features like statistics, graphs, records. In this application you can have the good user interface graphs and with reports will help you to manage the BP and sugar level. you can control your blood pressure and sugar levels using our application BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info App. Manage your blood pressure, sugar levels, Weight and blood glucose at once by BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info App. Start to Manage your health conveniently by hands with BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info. And you will be able to get analysed reports of your blood pressure at anytime and anywhere after the meals and before meals.

BP and Sugar Checker Through Finger Info is really an information application which Calculates your blood pressure and sugar and make it as a record.
BP and Sugar Checker is actually an information application which Calculates your bp and sugar is made for the people who just want to measure the blood pressure and sugar to maintain the balance life in daily life.

Actually, this blood pressure monitor application gives you the information of records saved long back this application shows you high blood pressure, low Blood Pressure and Sugar Checker and normal blood pressure.

You can control the high blood pressure and sugar levels with BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info by viewing the records and also the graphs with all three kind of graphs are given as per the views.

You can use this BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info application to analyse your bp, pulse rates, sugar levels and weight. you can select the your bp values on scale then you can see your stage in different colors for the bp and sugar values.

BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info application is your best source if you want accurate information as fast as possible. This BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info application is purely works on offline mode. 

We created this Bp and sugar Check Through Finger Info app because we wanted to make it easy for everyone to find the blood pressure levels, sugar levels readings.

Highlighting Feature of this BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info application : - 

- Its very good user interface implemented in this application to check the high bp and sugar checker.
- You can store your Bp values and Sugar Values in offline mode also.
- You are able to check the measured data by the very good user interface list given.
- You can easily log and track systolic, diastolic, pulse by just swiping your finger.
- View your blood pressure records and sugar levels chats with different colour stages.
- You can view and monitor the blood pressure statistics and sugar levels statistics and   analyse them.
- You are able to enter your BP, weight and blood glucose data and view those records in graphs and lists.
- Easy to Use for blood pressure monitoring application with simple user interface.

Disclaimer :
BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info application is created to evaluate your bp, sugar and does not measure your blood pressure and sugar. The result values are only an example to give you a better understanding of BP and Sugar Check Through Finger Info App.

title: Smart Sugar Scanner
description:
Smart Sugar Scanner (SSS) provides you with a convenient healthcare management method. Non-invasive monitoring, obtaining multiple health data at one time, including hemoglobin, blood flow velocity, oxygen saturation, pulse, glucose etc. Fully understand our own health status. All record is kept for tracking by tendency chart or table list format. All of latest record, general record or history record can be shared via email to any person you cared.. Track health anytime, any place. Non-invasive way to track health. No consumables needed to test blood sugar. All-in-one healthcare assistant for our family, our friends and ourselves! 

All family members can do their own health check every day. After getting up, after breakfast, before going out, after dinner, before going to bed… anytime, anywhere for monitoring. Modern people tend to drink and eat too much sweets or high starch/sugar contained foods, especially for school-age children and students of all stages. Hyperglycemia (pre-diabetes) is the former type of type 2 diabetes. If glucose is not controlled well in advance, long-term hyperglycemia (pre-diabetes) will evolve into type 2 diabetes. Pregnant women are prone to gestational diabetes mellitus during pregnancy period. The GDM  occurrence will also have a comprehensive impact on fetus. Not only pregnant women need to be careful and healthy but also we should be more concerned about our own health. Control of starch and sweets intake, with appropriate exercise, well control glucose in the ideal range. SSS helps us to monitor five health values changes easily in daily life, grasp the change trend, timely adjust living habits, and create a healthy and happy life.

In addition to sharing with family and friends, data can be shared to family doctor as preventive medicine application. If family physicians or health care providers develop could platform for data integration, they can use collected data analysis to do big data application and enhance personal in-time care service 

Advantages: 
* Non-invasive
* Eco-friendly
* Easy operation
* Simple test 
* Share data
* Health reminders
* Record tracking

Your best health assistant, daily health diary, SSS!

title: Glycemia
description:
Glycemia is a data reader of Abbott FreeStyle libre sensor using NFC technology.

This release is UNOFFICIAL and is NOT supported by Abbot. It must be used AT YOUR OWN RISK.

*************Apparently does not work with USA 14 day sensor version************

VERY IMPORTANT : We highly suggest to test Glycemia with a sensor at end of life (1 day left for example) as similar software report issue depending of smartphone and apparently make the sensor unusable after.
Currently the reader is tested successfully with a Samsung Galaxy S5.

Fast usage :
Ensure NFC is enable on your smartphone and place the back of your phone close to the sensor :
1 short vibration : sensor is detected and begin to read the data
2 short vibrations : data acquisition is successful, the plot display the data.
1 long vibration : the reading fails.

What the application does :

- read the last 8 hours of data from the sensor and display a graphic time vs blood sugar level.
- Vocal reader, if enabled, on the last measured and estimated blood sugar level.
- store the data in a csv historical file, semi-colon separated, under sdcard/glycemia/total_history.log (format : timestamp yyyymmdd hh:mm:ss ; mmol/l corrected; mg/dl corrected; mg/dl raw value from sensor).
- display the historical of the last 90 days.
- display a minimal and maximal target values and can be personally set.
- Calculate an approximation of the HbA1c on the last 90 days and some other statistics according of the target values.
- Units can be chosen between mg/dl or mmol/l (refresh historical and read the sensor again to take effect)
- reading data even after the 14 days period sensor life : the measure can be inaccurate and may be wise to replace the sensor for sanitary reasons (extra 8 hours given from the depletion time of the sensor, values may be inaccurate).
- Corrective formula to calibrate the final values. if you don't want any correction, let as x*1.0.
For example, if you want to adjust with a simple factor ad 10%, put x*1.1
The recognized signs are x for the raw value, +-*/ for respectively add, subtract, multiply, divide. ^ for exponent, () for parenthesis.
USE AT YOU OWN RISK AS THE FINAL VALUE WILL BE SHIFTED FROM THE REAL VALUE FROM THE SENSOR.

What the application doesn't :
- activate a new sensor : you need to use the official Abbot reader.

About the access requests on the phone:
- NFC : to read the sensor
- CARD READ/WRITING : to store and read the historical values. If you don't allow this grant, only the last 8 hours from the sensor will be displayed; not stats and historic will be values available.
- VIBRATION : vibration feedback as the screen is most probably not visible when you read the sensor.


To come in the next releases :
- add some more plots, pie chart and statistics.
- help button.
- enhance the visibility of the plots.
- French version
- still a lot to do...

Many thanks for your constructive feedback !

1 short vibration : sensor is detected and begin to read the data
2 short vibrations : data acquisition is successful, the plot display the data.
1 long vibration : the reading fails.

What the application does :

- read the last 8 hours of data from the sensor and display a graphic time vs blood sugar level.
- Vocal reader, if enabled, on the last measured and estimated blood sugar level.
- store the data in a csv historical file, semi-colon separated, under sdcard/glycemia/total_history.log (format : timestamp yyyymmdd hh:mm:ss ; mmol/l corrected; mg/dl corrected; mg/dl raw value from sensor).
- display the historical of the last 90 days.
- display a minimal and maximal target values and can be personally set.
- Calculate an approximation of the HbA1c on the last 90 days and some other statistics according of the target values.
- Units can be chosen between mg/dl or mmol/l (refresh historical and read the sensor again to take effect)
- reading data even after the 14 days period sensor life : the measure can be inaccurate and may be wise to replace the sensor for sanitary reasons (extra 8 hours given from the depletion time of the sensor, values may be inaccurate).
- Corrective formula to calibrate the final values. if you don't want any correction, let as x*1.0.
For example, if you want to adjust with a simple factor ad 10%, put x*1.1
The recognized signs are x for the raw value, +-*/ for respectively add, subtract, multiply, divide. ^ for exponent, () for parenthesis.
USE AT YOU OWN RISK AS THE FINAL VALUE WILL BE SHIFTED FROM THE REAL VALUE FROM THE SENSOR.

What the application doesn't :
- activate a new sensor : you need to use the official Abbot reader.

About the access requests on the phone:
- NFC : to read the sensor
- CARD READ/WRITING : to store and read the historical values. If you don't allow this grant, only the last 8 hours from the sensor will be displayed; not stats and historic will be values available.
- VIBRATION : vibration feedback as the screen is most probably not visible when you read the sensor.


To come in the next releases :
- add some more plots, pie chart and statistics.
- help button.
- enhance the visibility of the plots.
- French version
- still a lot to do...

Many thanks for your constructive feedback !

comments: Confusing with the bar showing increased risk of diabetes. I'm a T1D, that's the only reason I'd care to know what my hba1c is likely to be. Having an ifcc of 42.5 is showing up as borderline risk! Maybe if I was not a diabetic this would show its likely I have diabetes, but as a diabetic of 30 years this is the absolute best I've ever done & feel the app should award me for having a level below the recommended 48!
This app is spot on accurate. Great job.
I love this app! Finally an app I can work with.
I Love it
Very Easy & Accurate Calculation.

title: TRUE MANAGER™ AIR
description:
With TRUE MANAGER™ AIR Mobile App and TRUE METRIX® AIR Blood Glucose wireless meter, you can track data to get valuable insights that link daily activity with your glucose results. Easy-to-read charts, graphs and customizable notes make understanding data actionable. Also, share data with healthcare providers, friends, and family to help manage diabetes.  

Features:

o	Simple to navigate logbook  shows date, time,  blood glucose results and event tag from meter
o	Additional event tags may be added to results in addition to personal notes
o	Each blood glucose result is color coded to indicate if you are within acceptable range. You may customize the ranges given to you by your healthcare professional or use the default setting which are the established 2015 American Diabetes Association guideline target ranges (mg/dL): 
YELLOW = Above Normal >130
GREEN = Normal 80-130
RED = Hypoglycemic <70

NOTE: A DOCTOR OR HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL DETERMINES HOW OFTEN TO TEST AND WHAT THE TARGET RANGES ARE FOR BLOOD GLUCOSE RESULTS. 

o	Six Reports provide total insights :
	Average Report - View 7, 14, 30, 60, 90 and 120 day averages to review general trending and spot areas for improvement.
	Conformance Report - This report displays pre- and post- meal glucose results in a pie chart format. Each pie chart is divided into color coded sections identifying the percentage of glucose results that are above, within or below targeted ranges for each testing time. 
	Glucose Trend Report - This graph can be customized by target range, date and time to reveal patterns and to quickly identify glucose results that are too low or too high.
	Logbook Report - Review all glucose results, including control results, over a specific time period in chronological order.
	Modal Day/Week Report - View all results in specific time blocks per day or week. Color coded for easy review of glucose results within, above or below customized target ranges. 
	Summary Report – An excellent overview of glucose testing results and trends in 1 easy-to-read document.
o	Share data via PDF through email with healthcare providers, friends and family 
o	Help screens are available on most pages if assistance is needed. 

Important Information:
•	TRUE MANAGER AIR App is not for diagnostic use.
•	NEVER change your treatment plan without consulting a Doctor or Healthcare Professional.
•	TRUE MANAGER AIR App is for use with only specified supported mobile devices. Go to www.trividiahealth.com/truemanagerair for a list of compatible mobile devices.
•	This product is intended for single patient use to support better diabetes management without providing specific treatment or treatment suggestions.  
•	Refer to the TRUE METRIX® AIR Owner’s Booklet for pairing instructions.

summary: For use with TRUE METRIX AIR Blood Glucose wireless meter.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and compatibility improvements
comments: Yeah, I paired with the device in 10 min! You probably didn't read the instructions. If you own the app and click in the question mark (app digital manual) in order to pair you need to use the LAST SIX DIGITS OF THE DEVICES SERIAL NUMBER (ON THE BACK OF THE DEVICE). Then is syncs in seconds. RTFM! I will admit they should have made this clear in the initial set up for those who are technically challenged.

The True Metrix Air meter works OK, but this TrueManager Air app is the worst. You can't edit the log book or add comments or basically do anything with it. Plus, it doesn't work with a slew of phones because they don't update the app. Zero support for the app. I have a Pixel 3 phone, but the app only works with Pixel 2 phones and before. Google is up to Pixel 5 now and hasn't made Pixel 2 phones for over 3 years. Get my point.

I've used this app for 3 years. Early this year, there was an update. The only change I've found was a negative. You can no longer save a note. I contacted customer service & told them about it. I was transferred to teck support & told him about it. I could tell he was unaware of the situation. He took my number & said he would look into it. He called me a little bit later & said there were going to work on correcting his. That was about 4 months ago. It's still not fixed! Still disappointed!

At first it took a few tries to get it to connect to the meter but once you do everything works great.. A tip for you though..when you go to connect the meter make sure you pair your phone and meter first and keep your bluetooth turned ON in the meter. And when it asks for the pairing number look on the back of your meter and use the last 6 numbers to your meter.

I have paired my device with my phone and everytime I try to sync it with the app it truly does nothing, I cant really rate this app a ZERO but I feel as if that's what it should get, after pairing with the phone it does not matter cuz the app does nada!! I mean why is this all even an option, plus I cant connect my walgreens true Metrix air with anything what so ever!! I'm angry!

title: Diabetes Tracker
description:
Get rid of pen and pencil to write down your blood sugar test results! It is now much easier to calculate & track your blood sugar level, insulin intake & do so much more! 

Diabetes can and must be kept in check not just by having the right sugar levels in the body but also by the intake of proper diet and exercise regimes. Specifically designed for smart phones this amazing app is intended to help diabetics to manage better their diabetes and keep it under control. 

We have big plans for this app and look forward to make it as useful as possible for those trying to control their Diabetes & Insulin levels. The current version brings:

1. Glucometer: Manage your Diabetes levels effectively by tracking your glucose levels. View current, detailed or average readings in a list view or via detailed graphs and reports.
2. Medicine Tracker: Keep a track of your Insulin intake and all your Medicines. Schedule reminders to track the medicines that are taken and those that are dismissed.
3. Doctors & Appointments: Maintain an extensive list of Doctors and call them from within the app. Add & view all your Current and Previous Appointments so that you never miss any.
4. Food: Log all your meals in the Diet Diary. View easy to make, tasty recipes along with Diet Guidelines for the various types of diabetes and Superfoods that will help you to keep a check on your glucose levels.
5. Exercise: Comprehensive exercises including a warm-up, yoga poses, and aerobics with proper instructions and images, to help curb and improve your diabetes levels.
6. Reports: View reports of all modules in the App Reports section. Click a pic of and save all your health reports, in Lab Reports. Easily share them with your doctor.
7. Reminders: Remembering to test your sugar is always a problem, that's why in in this Diabetes app there are reminders that are associated with events so you'll never forget to test again!Reminders to check Blood Glucose, have your medicines, keep all your appointments and maintain exercise schedules.
8. Expenses: Log your Expenses as you spend! View your Total and Average Spend along with the details of each entry.
9. Blood Pressure Tracker: Blood Pressure Tracker helps you to record your blood pressure, anywhere, anytime. 

This app is actually noteworthy for those who seek perfection of body & mind!
 
Diabetes Tracker  is simple, quick, effective and proven! Manage your diabetes using Diabetes Tracker and take control of your diabetes today!

Whats Special

• Easy to use interface 
• Detailed graphs and reports
• Supports both US (mg/dl) & Standard (mmo/l) units.
• Rich & Intelligent functions	
• Easy to understand	
• Fast & Smooth Performance	
• Clear & Intuitive design	
• Fully Loaded Features	
• Phone Resource friendly	
• Friendly Widget

*Ads & IAP

This Smart App contains a wide range of amazing features, thus please consider that it contains in-app purchases to unlock some Pro Features via Mewards (Real & Virtual Money)

Benefits of Mewards

- Amazing offers to look out for!
- Use earned coins to unlock Premium features !
- Track the status of your Credits!

Note: Please consult your Doctor before you start any suggested exercise regime or consume any food.

**Support: support@migital.com
For any kind of help or confusion, simply write to us, and we would happily resolve your problems in a quick friendly manner. Kindly do not leave us any negative stars, we're here to help. Thanks :)

title: Blood Pressure Tracker
description:
Blood Pressure Tracker helps you to log your blood pressure, monitor blood pressure trends and shared with your doctors.

The app does NOT measure blood pressure.

Key Features
★ Log your systolic, diastolic, pulse and weight
★ Navigate in calendar view
★ Share your blood pressure with your doctors
★ Report in csv, html, Excel and pdf
★ Organize your blood pressure by tags
★ Automatically calculate blood pressure categories
★ Summary your blood pressure in max, min and avg
★ Monitor blood pressure trends
★ Helpful to monitor and control your blood pressure

English, 中文, Deutsch, Français, Español(Alina Talavera), Português(Luis Costa), Italiano, Dansk, Bosanski, Nederlands, Norsk, Pусский, Svenska, Magyar, Slovenščina, 日本語, Język polski, Україна

Excellent app to record and track change in blood pressure. Easy to use with all the right reporting.

title: BeatO SMART Diabetes Management
description:
It’s time to manage & monitor your diabetes in a SMART way! Go for BeatO, it is India’s leading diabetes management platform that provides a complete solution for all the daily needs of a diabetic.

BeatO combines cost-effective IoT hardware – the BeatO smartphone-connected glucose meters SMART & CURV – with the BeatO App to support end-to-end management for users. BeatO App is undoubtedly the best diabetes monitoring app through which you can get advice from certified doctors & nutritionists.

This diabetes tracker app is also very helpful in scheduling your medication deliveries & diagnostic services. You can also read & watch diabetes-focused content and buy specially curated diabetes-friendly foods, drinks & wellness products.

☆ Trusted by over 1 Lakh diabetic users, BeatO is the most popular Diabetes Management app.❤️

➡ We have helped users reduce their HbA1C levels by 1%p, which in turn has reduced their complication risk by 33%.✅

☆ BeatO App at a Glance
•	Automated personalised notifications based on your sugar readings
•	AI-driven nudging and triaging system
•	Estimated HbA1c based on the average of your sugar levels
•	Proactive doctor and medical specialist support via BeatO’s Virtual Endocrine Clinic
•	Emergency alerts to family & loved ones when readings are out of controlled range
•	Auto save readings, get trends & analysis using this sugar test app
•	Shop for diabetes-friendly foods, drinks & wellness products
•	Medicine reminders
•	Offers on medicines & lab tests all year round

BeatO Glucometer is an ideal sugar testing machine which is powered by our blood sugar test app, check out the features below:

1.	BeatO SMART Blood Sugar Tracker – Use BeatO glucometer (ISO and CE certified) with our feature-rich blood sugar App known as BeatO App for accurate blood sugar readings. Small in size, it gives you accurate sugar results in no time & the advantage of manually logging the readings.

2.	FREE Doctor and Dietician Consultations - FREE BeatO care round the clock! Consult top doctors & our team of medical experts (dieticians) who continuously monitor your sugar levels and can be reached out on-call or chat. Managing diabetes was never so easy!

3.	BeatO Rewards Program – Our reward points program has been specifically designed to drive compliance amongst our users for regular monitoring and better management of blood glucose levels.

4.	Logs and Trends - BeatO App uses colour coding to depict high, low and normal blood sugar levels. All blood glucose readings are automatically saved in the app blood sugar logbook and can be analysed with simple graphs.

5.	Emergency Alerts – You can choose to share readings which are out of controlled range with family, doctor and trusted contacts through automatic SMS alerts

6.	Save Big on Medicines – Buy medicines and order lab tests through BeatO App at an attractive discount. You get the convenience of free doorstep delivery, no min order value and COD.

7.	Diabetes-Friendly Range – We offer diabetes-friendly foods, drinks and wellness products.

8.	Sync your Fitness Tracker - Find out the calories you burn by syncing your fitness tracker to track your steps. This sugar checking app is compatible with Google Fit to show a unified view of your health & activity data.

SUPPORT
To improve BeatO Diabetes App, we are open for new ideas and suggestions. For any feedback connect with us at:

👉facebook.com/beatoapp

👉twitter.com/beatoapp

###

descriptionHTML:
It’s time to manage & monitor your diabetes in a SMART way! Go for BeatO, it is India’s leading diabetes management platform that provides a complete solution for all the daily needs of a diabetic.

BeatO combines cost-effective IoT hardware – the BeatO smartphone-connected glucose meters SMART & CURV – with the BeatO App to support end-to-end management for users. BeatO App is undoubtedly the best diabetes monitoring app through which you can get advice from certified doctors & nutritionists.

This diabetes tracker app is also very helpful in scheduling your medication deliveries & diagnostic services. You can also read & watch diabetes-focused content and buy specially curated diabetes-friendly foods, drinks & wellness products.

☆ Trusted by over 1 Lakh diabetic users, BeatO is the most popular Diabetes Management app.❤️

➡ We have helped users reduce their HbA1C levels by 1%p, which in turn has reduced their complication risk by 33%.✅

☆ BeatO App at a Glance
• Automated personalised notifications based on your sugar readings
• AI-driven nudging and triaging system
• Estimated HbA1c based on the average of your sugar levels
• Proactive doctor and medical specialist support via BeatO’s Virtual Endocrine Clinic
• Emergency alerts to family & loved ones when readings are out of controlled range
• Auto save readings, get trends & analysis using this sugar test app
• Shop for diabetes-friendly foods, drinks & wellness products
• Medicine reminders
• Offers on medicines & lab tests all year round

BeatO Glucometer is an ideal sugar testing machine which is powered by our blood sugar test app, check out the features below:

1. BeatO SMART Blood Sugar Tracker – Use BeatO glucometer (ISO and CE certified) with our feature-rich blood sugar App known as BeatO App for accurate blood sugar readings. Small in size, it gives you accurate sugar results in no time & the advantage of manually logging the readings.

2. FREE Doctor and Dietician Consultations - FREE BeatO care round the clock! Consult top doctors & our team of medical experts (dieticians) who continuously monitor your sugar levels and can be reached out on-call or chat. Managing diabetes was never so easy!

3. BeatO Rewards Program – Our reward points program has been specifically designed to drive compliance amongst our users for regular monitoring and better management of blood glucose levels.

4. Logs and Trends - BeatO App uses colour coding to depict high, low and normal blood sugar levels. All blood glucose readings are automatically saved in the app blood sugar logbook and can be analysed with simple graphs.

5. Emergency Alerts – You can choose to share readings which are out of controlled range with family, doctor and trusted contacts through automatic SMS alerts

6. Save Big on Medicines – Buy medicines and order lab tests through BeatO App at an attractive discount. You get the convenience of free doorstep delivery, no min order value and COD.

7. Diabetes-Friendly Range – We offer diabetes-friendly foods, drinks and wellness products.

8. Sync your Fitness Tracker - Find out the calories you burn by syncing your fitness tracker to track your steps. This sugar checking app is compatible with Google Fit to show a unified view of your health & activity data.

SUPPORT
To improve BeatO Diabetes App, we are open for new ideas and suggestions. For any feedback connect with us at:

👉facebook.com/beatoapp

👉twitter.com/beatoapp

comments: The app is working pretty well. The readings represent that of the lab and quote accurate. I love using this app. The only issue I have is continuous pricking which pai bs at the end of day. Will however need to observe a couple of cycles with the lab report to understand the deviation if any.Wireless feature in future would also be better as frequent fixing and removing in cherging slot could damage this in the long run.Dev, of Marketing, Geetha in tech were cooperative at every stage

Writing this review after using the app over 18 months now. I even took subscription and extremely happy with the decision I made. There are minor glitches in app sometimes, but support team is very good to resolve issues as soon as possible. Special mention to: Shrija and Devender for that quick support when I encountered issue with app.

Very Good App.Helpful in managing the Diabetes.but glucometer malfunctioning sometimes & hence strips used more. *Update can't be done without deleting some apps which are useful. Update not possible due to above reason.& hence can't take advantage of updated APPs. Please do something so that your Apps can be updated without deleting any existing apps. 19/10/2020. Very good App. It helps in controlling blood sugar levels. Dr.'s follow up is also appreciable in critical condition. Thanks a lot .

After one year the glucometer stopped working. On complaint the company said to buy a new meter. On purchase it worked only once. Then it stopped working. Now there is no meter to monitor my blood sugar. Two different smart phones I have tried and of no use.

Very helpful app for monitoring the blood sugar levels. The facility is that i dont need to go to the Lab, where the blood test charges are high and also risk of infection is very high. This is more economic and cost effective.

title: Dexcom G6 Simulator
description:
Dexcom G6 Simulator app highlights features from the Dexcom G6 CGM System. 

The simulator displays samples of CGM scenarios, trends, and various setup features associated with the Dexcom G6 CGM App.

This app is for simulation purposes only and contains no live CGM data.
descriptionHTML:
Dexcom G6 Simulator app highlights features from the Dexcom G6 CGM System.

The simulator displays samples of CGM scenarios, trends, and various setup features associated with the Dexcom G6 CGM App.

This app is for simulation purposes only and contains no live CGM data.
summary: Dexcom G6 Simulator App
recentChanges: Bug Fixes and General Enhancements
comments: It could be improved by the use of ability to write notations in the application and also take pictures and included in the daily notes. I love another app called my sugar which relies on finger sticks to tell the app your blood sugar but doesn't have the continuous blood sugar monitoring ability. if Dexcom could utilize some of those aspects that would be great. Main reason why I use the Dexcom app is for my G6 sensor and being able to utilize my phone and a receiver to let me know what my blood sugar is doing at all times.

unbelievable like all other reviews, I need an app that monitors my blood and can send it to followers on the follow app too. I do not need a tutorial manual on how to use the real useable app, which is what this is.. This is a disgrace! I don't understand what dexcom is thinking, but I think giving them a call or writing them every email in the world is necessary for them to make an app that works on all phones so it can save more peoples lives!! I wish I could write more, but the word limit..
Horrible having to carry around 2 devices, because Dexcom G6 isn'tcompatibleto Samsung or Fitbit. This is a medical device😡Please fix this problem.

Wow. Gotta wonder how some of y'all actually function on a day to day basis. It's a SIMULATOR. Of course it's not going to monitor YOUR glucose. 🤔🤣 The actual apps (g5 and g6) work for Android. If your phone isn't in the list of "supported" phones there's ways around that. You have to know how to work the Google searchy clicky thing though. So, not much confidence in that being a solution. 🙄 SMH it's right there in the name of the app AND the description. Sim-u-la-tor.

I rate the app as 4, but the service you all provide supplying the sensor is horrible. They are doing the app greatness an I justice by not supplying its customers the product in time to even use the app. Yes, I'm a Dexcom G6 patient (was). They never send the sensors.

title: AgaMatrix Diabetes Manager
description:
Dashboard
Organize modules on the dashboard to show the information you want, in the order you choose.

Sharing
Invite your caregivers to view your glucose readings in real time, or email all of your data in a traditional logbook format.

Reminders
Reminders can be automatically triggered by another event; for example, 15 minutes after a hypo result, you will receive an automatic reminder to test again.

Compatible Meters
Automatically sync with the following meters:
• AgaMatrix Jazz™ Wireless 2 Blood Glucose Meter
• CVS Health™ Advanced Bluetooth® Glucose Meter
• Amazon Choice Blood Glucose Monitor
• Meijer® Essential Wireless Blood Glucose Meter

Cloud Support
Sign up for an account and back up your data on our HIPAA compliant server.
 
Multiple Data Types 
Record glucose, insulin, carbs and weight with a touch of a button.

Timeline
Track all your data in one place to easily spot trends. Choose the view that works best for you: 1 day, 1 week or 1 month.

Logbook
Rotate the app for the glucose logbook you know and love, organized by meal block.

Customer Service
AgaMatrix has a 10-year track record developing FDA-cleared diabetes products and our customer service experts are available 24/7. Call us anytime at 866-906-4197 or email customerservice@agamatrix.com.

Love our app? Rate us in the Play Store! Running into a bug or have feedback? Email us at customerservice@agamatrix.com.

comments: For being as cheap as the meter and test strips were it offers a comperiable app with few extras. No nonsense, simply does what it preposes to do.
Takes you right into the bluetooth and never leaves or shows any other options never allows phone and meter to do pairing process..i
The best so far for me....I'm able to track an maintain my levels just right.....easy to use...

App is far more capable than I expected, especially after paying less than $25 for the meter. Tags and graphs the important information with enough flexibility to be useful but not so much as to be confusing. I believe I'll be using this for some time.

OK. Very average. There are much better apps out there for diabetes. The only reason I use this app is that it appears to be the only one that syncs with my CVS branded AgaMatrix meter which is very small and convenient. If the Diabetes M: app were to add the CVS meter as a compatible item, I would delete the mediocre AgaMatrix app without a second thought.

title: Diabetic Recipes : Healthy Food
description:
Diabetic cooking doesn't have to be a challenge. These recipes make it easy to whip up delicious, healthy, diabetic-friendly meals. For people with diabetes, healthy eating is not simply a matter of what one eats, but also when one eats. Discover delicious, healthy recipes that fit into a diabetic diet. People with diabetes can eat any food that they want, preferably a healthy diet with some carbohydrates, but they need to be more aware of the carbohydrate content of foods and avoid simple sugars like juices and sugar-sweetened beverages.

Whether you’re trying to prevent or control diabetes, your nutritional needs are virtually the same as everyone else, so no special foods are necessary. But you do need to pay attention to some of your food choices, most notably the carbohydrates you eat. While following a heart-healthy diet can help with this, the most important thing you can do is to lose a little weight.

Losing just 5% to 10% of your total weight can help you lower your blood sugar, blood pressure, and cholesterol levels. Losing weight and eating healthier can also have a profound effect on your mood, energy, and sense of well being. Even if you’ve already developed diabetes, it’s not too late to make a positive change. By eating healthier, being more physically active, and losing weight, you can reduce your symptoms or even reverse diabetes. The bottom line is that you have more control over your health than you may think.

Nutrition and physical activity are important parts of a healthy lifestyle when you have diabetes. Along with other benefits, following a healthy meal plan and being active can help you keep your blood glucose level, also called blood sugar, in your target range. To manage your blood glucose, you need to balance what you eat and drink with physical activity and diabetes medicine if you take any. What you choose to eat, how much you eat, and when you eat are all important in keeping your blood glucose level in the range that your health care team recommends.

DIABETIC RECIPES APP EXPERIENCE

This is simple to navigate and also has multiple tutorials available on how to use the app.
As the recipe is a set of instructions for cooking, our app also provides nutritional information, servings, total time for preparation and recommendations so that nothing can go wrong when you’re cooking.

Theme Support

Protect your eyes from being hurt by a bright screen at night by enabling dark mode.
Make your diabetic recipes cooking experience more comfortable at night.

Smart Shopping List for Your Diet Control

An organized shopping list allows the user to create ingredients list so you won’t miss any for the recipe. Users can also add items directly from recipes.

It also has offline access.

Search 1M+ Healthy Recipes

Apart from shopping list our app also provides a global search feature
where you can find diabetic-friendly recipes you looking for or discover new recipes

Collect Your Favorite Diet

Use our bookmark button to save and organize low carb recipes in your favorite recipe list. They also have offline access.

Personal Profile

Do you have a wonderful diabetic recipe that you’d like to share? We would love for you to upload it. To submit your tasty recipe all you need to create an account. In addition to that, you can also upload your tasty food photos, and leave feedback, comments, and tips over our chef community.

Native Language

Another key feature of our app is it supports multiple languages.
Currently, we offer around 13 main languages.

Recipes Finder for Low Calorie Recipes

Recipe Finder can help you find a good diabetic recipe based on what you have in your fridge. You can provide a list of ingredients you have and bounce ideas off recipe finder so you never end up wasting any food!

Download the free Diabetic Recipes app today. Happy Cooking!

comments: I can live with the pop-up ads while I'm deciding if I want to buy premium. What earns this app the low rating is an inability to filter recipes by ingredients and the fact that it CRASHED after I wrote a review for the recipe i had made. The first is unfortunate. The second is terminal. Goodbye. Uninstalled.

My sister's doctor said she had to absolutelty get her diabetes under control. Her numbers were very high . I download this app and started cooking within two meals her numbers were lowered now they are at a normal level. She has never felt this good ! Her doctor is so pleased , she is extremely happy . I am very glad this app is available . It saved her life !!! We are all very grateful !!!
Brilliant app I now have a healthier diet. It's so easy to use and favourite recipes are easy to find
Sugar free doesn't mean it's a diabetic meal. Carbs is the worst next thing to diabetics and there's recipes with loaded carbs. Just go to diabetic cookies and see yourself.
I love it. One thing. Wish there were more choice of veggies on the recipe finder? Is there a way to add more and I missed it?

title: Blood Pressure Tracker - BP Checker - BP Logger
description:
Manage Your Blood Pressure, Weight, BMI, Blood Glucose Level, Heart Rate, Sugar Level, spo2, bp & Diabetes at once by Free Blood Pressure App!

Control your blood pressure with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports your doctor will love and many other tools to analyze high or low blood pressure! 

Blood Pressure Checker Diary : BP Tracker History Log, Controls blood pressure & blood sugar level with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports doctor will love & many other tools to analyze high or low blood pressure value. Blood Pressure Control.

Control high blood pressure (i.e., Hypertension) with blood pressure monitor : bp checker app!
 
Features:
  
💓 Log blood pressure & pulse readings using fast keyboard data entry.
💓 Understand what the numbers mean & monitor blood pressure trends with statistics & interactive charts.
💓 Send blood pressure PDF reports to your physician/doctor.
💓 Set up reminders to take blood pressure measurements or medication.
💓 Export or import blood pressure data in CSV format for easy data interchange with other applications e.g. Microsoft Excel.
💓 Manage blood pressure records of multiple profiles (great for caregivers).
💓 Support for common blood pressure classification guidelines (ACC/AHA, ESH/ESC, JNC).
💓 Keep your data safe with automatic backups.
💓 Configurable date/time formats & measurement units.
  
Simple and Easy to use:
 
1. You can easily log and track systolic, diastolic and pulse by just swiping your finger.
2. You can easily add your tags (e.g., irregular heartbeat, cuff location like left/right arms, seated/reclined).
3. You can easily search your data (e.g., by date, tags, and bloodpressure zones).
Blood Pressure Diary : Evaluation Info Log History Tracker has been made for the people who need constant management for Blood Pressure, weight and blood glucose.

According to American Heart Association (AHA), normal range of blood pressure are Systolic 91 ~ 120 mmHg and Diastolic 61 ~ 80 mmHg. Please enjoy our blood pressure log and tracker app.


Organized:
- In order to be organized & use hand sets for health, use specially designed - BP info tool. Add notes, postures, location along with body weight & glucose with Blood Pressure - BP INFO.

History:
- Always have an access to older records with Blood Pressure Info App.

Trends:
- Can see trends on line graphs & bar graph with date & compare statistics on graph & control High Blood Pressure.

Data Record:
- You are able to enter your BP, weight & blood glucose data & view those records in graphs & lists.

Report:
- BP Journal App announces the analyzed changes & the average value of total entered data in 7 days, 30 days & 60 days.

Goal setting:
- You are able to set the target for your Blood Pressure & weight value.

Graph:
- You are able to view the measured data as a whole graph divided by year, month, week & day.

Diary & Memo:
- By entering a memo in the recorded data, you are able to record thought at the moment of measurement

Alarm:
- Do you keep forgetting to take the medicine? BP Diary provides a time alarm to take a medicine & a notification.

Note: This app DOES NOT measure blood pressure nor Blood Pressure History. To measure blood pressure reliably, use a clinically-validated blood pressure monitor. It is not possible to measure blood pressure with fingerprint scanner on the smart phone.

title: Sukar – Blood Glucose & Diabetes Tracker App
description:
SUKAR - EASY TO USE DIABETES TRACKING APP

Drumrolls, please. Today is the day that your diabetes tracking will become more bearable. Sukar will help you control your sugar level with the easy to use diabetes diary app.

Need for Diabetes Apps
Being a diabetic patient; either it is Type I or Type II diabetes; it is always required to keep up with a dedicated glucose tracker routine. One has to be cautious to maintain his or her glucose level or Blood sugar levels. Not being able to keep a regular track of glucose level in consideration can have adverse effects on overall health of diabetes patients in the long run. Use of diabetes apps makes it convenient to log and track your sugar intake.

Maintain your Sugar Level
Let's be honest. Diabetes didn't contribute anything useful to your life so far. But that is not how it has to be. Sukar, the brand new insulin tracker app, will bring more structure in your life which will lead to better levels in your glucose. 

Easy to use and clean UI
Sukar – Blood Glucose & Diabetes Tracker App is the best digital diabetes diary with easy to understand UI/UX so anyone can use it without any hassle. Bid farewell to old glucose tracker technique. Save paper and your precious time with Sukar.

Serves as a Medicine Organizer
Unlike other diabetes apps, Sukar also serves as a medicine organizer. Register your medication to keep track of the intake. Take a look at the detailed reporting and analytics to help you fight diabetes. Never miss your medication again and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

Features of Sukar
- Blood Glucose & Diabetes Tracker App:
- Secure and personalised logging screen with precise blood sugar level statistics;
- Diabetes diary that displays your daily measurements;
- Private and secure data storage in the cloud;
- Easily log your glucose in the app
- Get blood sugar reporting in PDF or CSV
- Ability to share the glucose levels with your doctor via the native share functionality
- Add comments to your glucose measurements

Will you like to keep you diabetes under control forever? The new diabetes tracking app is the right option for you. Download and use Sukar – Blood Glucose & Diabetes Tracker App today!

title: Health2Sync - Diabetes Care
description:
Health2Sync has been selected by Healthline as one of the "Best Diabetes Apps of 2019". 

Health2Sync helps you combat diabetes by making blood sugar tracking more meaningful.  You can easily log your blood sugar, blood pressure, weight, medication, diet, exercise, and mood through the app.  Health2Sync provides you helpful feedback based on your blood sugar records to help you manage diabetes. 

Key features of Health2Sync:

-- Blood sugar tracking --
Manually entering your blood sugar records is fast and intuitive with Health2Sync.  Along with your blood sugar readings, you can enter notes, select medication you used, food you’ve consumed, and attach photos.  Alternatively, you can also purchase the Health2Sync Smart Cable, which will allow you to upload readings in bulk from your glucometer.

-- Blood pressure tracking --
You can track your blood pressure readings as well with Health2Sync.  Enter your systolic, diastolic, and pulse readings and easily see how you've been progressing with blood pressure control.

-- Weight tracking --
We know how important weight control is for Type 2 Diabetes, so you can also keep track of weight changes with Health2Sync.  You can enter your weight and body fat, set goals, and easily see what progress you've made.

-- Dashboard --
Every time you open the app, you will immediately see a dashboard that gives you a quick analysis of your recent blood sugar history in table and graph formats.  You can see whether your readings are in range, the movement of your readings, and you can even chart differences between your before meal and after meal readings.  

-- Diary --
Diary allows you to easily review your past blood sugar records.  You can quickly see what factors contributed to a high or low reading.  You can also view the diary in a table format to quickly compare before meal and after meal readings.  

-- Partners --
We know having diabetes can make you feel lonely sometimes.  You can invite your loved ones to become partners with you on Health2Sync.  As your partner, not only can they stay on top of your blood sugar changes, they can also provide you warm encouragements to keep you going.

-- Data Export --
The data you enter in the app can be exported as a PDF Report or Excel file.  You can e-mail this data to your doctor directly from the app, or mail it to yourself and print it out prior to your next visit.

-- A1C tracking --
A1C gives you a long-term indicator of blood sugar control.  You can also keep track of your A1C history and view your trends with the Health2Sync App.

We know that testing blood sugar can be painful and tiring sometimes, we really hope Health2Sync can make diabetes management more meaningful to you.  For more information about our app and Smart Cable, please go to our website at https://www.health2sync.com.

title: Easy Diabetes
description:
This application is useful for all people with diabetes type 1 and type 2 with oral hypoglycemic agents or insulin treatment. Its main function is the recording of blood glucose level (HGT) with a simple and intuitive interface. (*) 

Under categories you can select the various moments of the day. Major are: breakfast, lunch, dinner! Also you can add other categories to suit your needs. 

There are two display options: graph or statistics, displayed according to blood level, normal, high or low! A true estimate ..... Very useful to monitor your progress! 

You'll never have to write your daily diary .... But with this application will be very easy to send your levels to the doctor. 

Registration of values ​​is possible for a period of 30 days, in the premium version this limit is not present.

recentChanges: Lib update and chart day selection
comments: I like how the app allows me to take notes such as the food I ate or if I did exercise for that day it's also good to know when I ate weather it's before or after a meal. I also like how if I forgot to input my blood sugar I can actually go back and put the actual time and date. This app is very easy and self-explanatory

This is a no-frills app. If you're not a tech savvy person this is a good app for you; very simple to use. There are more complex apps that include other health logs, like BP, weight, medications, and diet & exercise logs but it seems many are designed primarily for type I diabetes and they are tedious to use. If you just want a simple app to track your reads, this one does it nicely.

I totally love this app so easy to use and records information of what you have eaten it also does a graph and you can print out the information too. This app is the best one I have found and I love it and no adds and no hidden costs either. You can just use this app as it is so easy. I love it

Excellent App! Does everything that I want it too! Simple to use. Intuitive! Looked at many other Apps that do the same thing, chose this App and glad that I did! Helps me manage my Diabetes day to day, and long term. Is very worth the small fee for the Premium version. I definitely give this App five stars.

No frills log. Just wanted to be able to record my sugar levels not all the other garbage! Just recently diagnosed and with all the changes I am making to manage my diabetes I need simple when it came to logging my levels, without having to always find my paper log. This is the app for me!

title: BD™ Diabetes Care:  24/7 Diabetes Assistant & Log
description:
** BD, the company that, helps 30 million people with diabetes each year! **

BD™ Diabetes Care (BDDC) is the smarter, simpler approach to diabetes management for people who have Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes.

Download today and get a personal diabetes assistant, Briight, at the push of a button available 24/7; a diabetes log; access to a range of healthy diabetic recipes; tools to help you maintain a normal blood sugar level and much more!

GET ADVICE & KNOWLEDGE TO ENJOY THE THINGS YOU LOVE!
Keep a diabetic log book to receive actionable insights, save your favorite healthy snacks and get personalized nutritional advice for diabetic diet plans. Help manage your blood sugar levels and learn how to fit some of your favorite meals into your diet plan with a range of diabetic recipes. BD™ Diabetes Care has you covered with instant answers to all your food questions when you need them most.

Why manage your diabetes with the BD™ Diabetes Care app?
• Briight, the always on, personal assistant to answer your diabetes questions 24/7

• Ever evolving personalization based on your feedback and interactions

• Lifestyle and medical tips based on whether you have Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes
• Set and achieve personalized diabetes health goals to keep you motivated and on track

title: MyDiabetes - Blood Sugar Tracker/monitor app
description:
Designed for both smart phones and tablets, this application will help you manage your diabetes better and keep it under control. Whether you are Type 1 or Type 2, have Gestational Diabetes or just want to help and monitor a family member, this is the logbook app for you. 

The application tracks almost all aspects of the diabetes treatment and provides you and with detailed reports, charts and statistics. You can send the reports to your supervising physician via email. Diabetes: M also gives you various tools, so you can find the trends in blood glucose levels and allows you to get an insight about normal and prolonged insulin boluses using its highly effective, top-notch Bolus Advisor.

It also has a vast nutrition database, to help you keep track of your food intake and nutrition information, as well as exercise time. Never forget another check with our simple but powerful reminders system. 

Diabetes: M can analyze the values ​​from the imported data from various glucometers and insulin pumps via the exported files from their respective diabetes management software systems. 
You can use HealthyDiabetes as a 24-hour follow-up, and have all diabetic data displayed all at once, from the first page. Monitor your medical status using a daily graph, average blood sugar, standard deviation, amount of insulin, activity rates, The app also provides information on several thousand foods, including including carbohydrates and other nutrients. According to five-star reviews, HealthyDiabetes is the most popular diabetes monitoring app in the world.

☆ HealthyDiabetes FEATURES:

• Quick and easy entry of blood sugar, insulin, meals, activities, HbA1c, weight, pulse, blood pressure and oxygen saturation
• Customizable units
• Clear graphs on the evolution of blood sugar
• Detailed output of user data in the log
• Smart search: places, food, activities - everything can be searched •
• Food database with thousands of entries
• PDF and CSV export
• backup
• Callback function
• HbA1c estimated at first glance
• Statistics
• Quick and easy connection (meals, diet, medication, carbohydrate intake, blood sugar level etc.)
• Custom login screen (add, delete, rearrange fields)
• Smart and clear blood sugar graphs
• Daily, weekly and monthly medical analysis
• Challenges to achieve personal therapeutic goals
• Motivational feedback to help manage types 1 & 2 of diabetes
• Secure backup of monitoring data
• Insightful data analysis
• Dark mode
• Completely free app


It also has an extensive nutrition database, which will help you keep track of your food consumption and nutritional information, as well as the duration of your exercises. Never forget another check with our simple but powerful reminder system.

The HealthyDiabetes app is a diary that keeps track of your daily routine and eliminates the need to monitor, control and manage your type 1 or 2 diabetes. Your medical information is displayed at a glance. Stay in control of your health, monitor your diet, manage your insulin intake, avoid hypers / hypos and control the situation as a diabetic, all for the price of one coffee per month.

- App for types 1 and 2 diabetes
- Most popular app in the world, supporting five-star ratings and ratings
- Winner of the German magazine "Focus Diabetes" and "Best applications for diabetics"
- The HealthyDiabetes app is a Class 1 medical device in the US and the EU

We are working around the clock to improve the HealthyDiabetes app and need your feedback! Do you have a problem, criticism, question, suggestion or compliment? Contact us:

healthydiabetesprt@gmail.com

title: Blood Pressure Log - MyDiary
description:
Blood Pressure Log with reminders, lots of statistics, and ability to export data. The app does NOT measure the blood pressure.


Adding blood pressure measurements is very easy thanks to a clean user interface and a dedicated keypad. The blood pressure log can be viewed not only in a table but also in a number of charts and statistics. You can print the log or send it directly to your doctor.


Blood Pressure Log
 • Log the blood pressure readings
 • Add the cuff location and the body posture
 • See interactive charts, statistics, and a summary
 • Print reports or share the data by email 
 • Import data exported from other apps (using the CSV format)


Additional Features
 • Track weight, glucose, and oxygen saturation
 • Define custom ranges for low and high blood pressure
 • Add custom tags and description to each measurement
 • Customize ranges for low and high blood pressure
 • Filter the displayed data


Export Data
 • Save to a file or send by email
 • Generate reports for the MS Word
 • Create Excel spreadsheets

 • Export to CSV or XML data formats


Problems, ideas or questions?Contact: info@mydiary-bloodpressure.com

recentChanges: New setting options and general improvements
comments: This is the best app I've ever used out of any app. This app not only does as described but there's no hidden fees. It's easy to use, it keeps all info stored in a very neat manner. It also has an option to put all your inputs into charts that can be printed and/or emailed! If i could give 10 stars I would! Great app! I never leave reviews either, went out of my way for this one.

Love the ability to store the info on my phone, then download it to my PC, or any of the other options this app affords, when I choose to. There's no website or online account to set up access to (AAA+ for that!). The data stays on my phone until I choose to put it somewhere else. All apps should be this user-friendly. Well done!

This has been the best way for us to get my husband to keep track of his blood pressure. He showed his doctor who was impressed with the functionality of the app, especially the ability for my husband to email him the readings. As a student nurse, I have also shown this app to several of my patients who were impressed with how simple and easy to use it was. The only thing I could suggest is adding a spot to record temperature readings so all basic vital signs are recorded.

Add a Temperature Field! Love this app! I never had to keep track of my blood pressure until I got very nervous and it spiked. I'm now on 2 medications & have home & work BP monitors. I used the free app, was very impressed and bought the regular app. Easy to use. The statistics are great. Writing Developers to see if they can add a temperature field.

I've used this app daily for two years now and am very glad that I have. It has helped me lower my blood pressure and weight by being more aware of them. Finally paid, not so much to get rid of the irritating ads as to give credit where it is due. Early on, I found a way around the annoying ads which appear when you save a reading using the New Entry button. Otherwise I might have looked for another app. Use the History button instead and choose today's date. No ads!

title: GlucoStar Beta - Blood Glucose
description:
Controlling blood sugar levels is critical to maintaining a healthy lifestyle for individuals with diabetes. GlucoStar makes it easy to track glucose readings and share them with your healthcare provider.

Features:

• Manually enter readings from any blood glucose monitor, glucometer, or blood glucose meter.
• Add notes and tags to help you remember details about the readings.
• View your measurement history as a list or a dynamic chart.
• Export measurements in CSV format.
• Bring the app to your appointments to show your readings to your doctor.

Major pain if making several entries at once. On add have to tap in field to bring up keyboard. On screen number pad would be significantly better. UI looks very good and operates smoothly .

title: HbA1c
description:
Convert from estimated average glucose (eAG) in mg/dL to HbA1c based on ADA and Diabetes UK calculator. 
Also, BMI calculator. 

ADA, EASD and IDF are recommending the use of a new term in diabetes management, estimated average glucose, or eAG. Health care providers can now report A1C results to patients using the same units (mg/dl or mmol/l) that patients see routinely in blood glucose measurements. 

Estimated AG (eAG): was calculated by combining weighted results from at least 2 days of continuous glucose monitoring performed four times

References: 
Nathan DM, Kuenen J, Borg R, Zheng H, Schoenfeld D, Heine RJ. Translating the A1C assay into estimated average glucose values. Diabetes Care 2008; 31(8):1473-8.
www.diabetes.co.uk
http://professional.diabetes.org/glucosecalculator.aspx Accessed : March 2014

title: Diabetes
description: The Diabetes app was created to keep a diary of monitoring and calculating the dose of insulin for insulin-dependent diabetes ( diabetes mellitus ). With it, you can get the calculation of the necessary dose of insulin, avoid hypoglycemia attacks, keep a food diary, monitor blood glucose ( sugar ), and monitor the daily rate of insulin. The app will help You not only maintain a normal blood glucose level, but also control your diet and weight. The app also allows you to easily export data for external monitoring by your doctor (. pdf,. xls)and provide them with the necessary information about Your lifestyle in order to adjust the insulin coefficient that you need. The app will remind you to re-measure glucose or to inject insulin. Diabetes control in Russian and English . Diary of glucose.

With it, you can get the calculation of the necessary dose of insulin, avoid hypoglycemia attacks, keep a food diary, monitor blood glucose ( sugar ), and monitor the daily rate of insulin. The app will help You not only maintain a normal blood glucose level, but also control your diet and weight. The app also allows you to easily export data for external monitoring by your doctor (. pdf,. xls)and provide them with the necessary information about Your lifestyle in order to adjust the insulin coefficient that you need. The app will remind you to re-measure glucose or to inject insulin. Diabetes control in Russian and English . Diary of glucose.
summary: Keeping a self-monitoring diary and calculating insulin doses.

comments: nice app. please - add the synchronization possibility - pull product base from myfitnesspal or so (whiich are bigger) with barcode scanning

Приложение хорошее, много использовал но останусь на этом для контроля. Конечно есть баги и их нужно править,а я тк QA видно их , писал через репорт. Но они не значительные. Не хватает дизайна для восприятия, стандартные элементы уже в прошлом :)
Суперское приложение. Облегчает все расчеты, плюс ещё и свою базу данных создаёшь. 5 из 5 🤘

Приложение удобное, есть напоминания о измерении ГК после еды. Есть встроенный калькулятор ХЕ и база данных продуктов. Так же есть подсчёт дозы инсулина на приём пищи. Не совсем понимаю систему добавления своих продуктов, думаю стоить пересмотреть интерфейс системы добавления своих продуктов, либо добавить обучение для этого пункта.
Good app

title: Glucocalc Glucose Calculator
description:
Glucocalc is a glucose calculator designed to help you keep track of your progress in maintaining proper control of your blood glucose levels. By entering in your average blood glucose values (eAG) you can calculate an estimate of your projected HbA1c. You can also derive an eAG from an HbA1c input. Glucocalc outputs results in both NGSP (National Glycohemoglobin Standardization Program) and IFCC (The International Federation of Clinical Chemistry and Laboratory Medicine) standards (mg/dl, %) and (mmol/L, mmol/mol).

About HbA1c

Glycated hemoglobin (hemoglobin A1c) is a form of hemoglobin that is measured primarily to identify the average plasma glucose concentration over prolonged periods of time

A high A1c represents poor glucose control.

However, a good HbA1c  can still hide a history of recent hypoglycemia, or even spikes of hyperglycemia.

Regular blood glucose monitoring is still the best method for the analysis of overall vascular health with respect to blood sugar control.

title: Dexcom CLARITY
description:
Dexcom CLARITY is a diabetes management application for CGM users. It provides relevant insights into users’ retrospective glucose values, patterns, and trends over time.

Dexcom CLARITY is an important part of your Dexcom CGM system. It can help you identify glucose patterns and, with your healthcare professional, determine the potential causes of those patterns.

Dexcom CLARITY users experience up to 15% increased time in range (70-180mg/dL) as compared to non-users.*

Log in with your Dexcom account to:
•	Keep tabs on your time in range, patterns and other key metrics.
•	Allow clinics to access to your data and reports to make appointments more efficient.
•	Set Time in Range goals.
•	Turn on daily or weekly notifications and emails.
•	View, save, print, and email all reports.
•	Connect to partner apps for more features and benefits.

This app store should not be used as your first point of contact to resolve technical or customer services issues. In order to protect your privacy and personal information, and promptly resolve any technical or customer services issues you are having with any Dexcom product, please contact 1-888-738-3646.

Dexcom is required to follow up with customers regarding product-related complaints. If Dexcom determines that your comment/complaint requires follow up, a technical support representative will attempt to contact you to gather more information regarding your comment/complaint.

*Parker AS, Welsh J, Jimenez A, Walker T. Insights from big data (2): Benefits of self-guided retrospective review of continuous glucose monitoring reports. Diabetes Technol Ther. 2018;20(S1):A-27.

recentChanges:
Dexcom CLARITY has updated Time in Range to reflect clinical standards with new range names, a fifth Very High range, and recommended ranges from an international consensus.
Dexcom CLARITY settings default to reflect these ranges. Tap Profile > Glucose Ranges to review and adjust your ranges.
comments: I could never keep my bg in control before I started using the CGM/this app. My extreme highs and lows have settled into a very minimally variable horizontal line within range most days. My time in range is phenomenally good. It's as if I was blind before, but now have glasses to see. I love this app! And I am feeling so much better because my glucose control is better. I have energy, can think/concentrate, have lost weight because I'm no longer "feeding the insulin, and sleep better.

Once again...for as advanced as the G6 is, the app should be compatible with more than just the "latest" IPhone. I have Samsung Fold and was sad to find it wasn't compatible. Only 20% of population has an Iphone. The receiver reminds me of a flip phone I had 10 years ago. Please update for MODERN Android phones.

Another crappy app by dexcom with huge design flaws. It takes forever to produce a report and during that time if the app loses focus (if you switch to another app or if your screen turns off) the report production will cancel without warning and without informing you. So you have to wait several minutes while touching the screen every few seconds to make sure your screen doesn't turn off while the app does its thing. This is ridiculous.

Yeah, it helps me to refine and schedule my meal changes, periods of activity, BG insulin corrections and my exercise program by showing BG pattern changes periodically throughout the previous day. Kudos for a reliable, well-considered app for helping the diabetic and his care team in dealing with the challenges of diabetes!

Extremely helpful. A must needed tool to control and figure out best treatment, like what foods trigger my blood sugar. I keep a low sugar / carb diet. I have a difficult situation. I also take ani rejection meds steroids which cause my blood sugar to go up as well without this app I was always guessing now I know exactly how to control my issues when they're high which they are many times I'm able to correct due to my steroids

title: OneTouch Reveal® Plus Digital Diabetes Coach
description:
*** OneTouch Reveal® Plus is only available via access code from your employer or health plan. ***

OneTouch Reveal® Plus app is a digital diabetes coach that provides real-time support, works in partnership with your healthcare team, and helps you build self-care skills that can lead to better diabetes management.  OneTouch Reveal® Plus app is FDA cleared for Type 1 and Type 2 adults 18+ with diabetes.

REAL-TIME PERSONALIZED DIABETES GUIDANCE
•	Receive real-time, customized coaching messages with each blood glucose result – anytime, anywhere.
•	AI technology provides thousands of customized messages based on your blood glucose values and trends
•	Helps guide you through hypoglycemia episodes with prompts about what to do next 
•	Provides helpful tips to address high blood glucose results

SUPPORT FOR HEALTHIER EATING
•	Build your meal by choosing a recipe, searching the database, or adding your own food
•	Snap a picture or scan barcodes to identify nutrition information identify nutrition information or add a food to your food diary
•	Create healthy meal plans and share them with others
•	Share your Grocery list and/or order the ingredients online 
•	Restaurant Helper feature helps you find foods that fit your carb range when eating out

DIABETES MANAGEMENT TOOLS PROVIDE SUPPORT BETWEEN DOCTOR VISITS
•	Organize all your insulin and oral medications and set reminders  
•	You can import your medication and lab results by connecting to your pharmacy or lab
•	Logbook helps you track your daily glucose, food, activity, and sleep 
•	Weekly reports and insights highlight what’s working and offers suggestions what to change
•	Share progress with your care team by sending a SMART Visit Report with the click of a button
•	Get educational support via OneTouch U™ with short, easy-to-read lessons
•	Get answers to general diabetes questions from Certified Diabetes Educators using the ‘Ask an Educator’ feature

VIEW YOUR HEALTH INFORMATION IN ONE PLACE  
•	Sync information from a device you are already using -  OneTouch Reveal® Plus connects to over 20 different devices (including BG meters, weight scales, blood pressure cuffs and activity trackers) allowing you to view all your health information in the app 
•	Sync your blood sugar results seamlessly from the OneTouch Verio Flex® meter or the OneTouch Verio Reflect® meter
•	Connect your Fitbit®, Garmin®, Misfit™, Polar®, Strava, or Withings activity tracker to see exercise, steps, sleep, height and weight
•	Syncs with Google Fit® so you can view your steps, activities, sleep, blood glucose, blood pressure and weight

comments: Issues with syncing BG monitor resolved and results are good, feedback is very good and helpful. Even though the app is connected to Google Fit or seems to be, nothing is being recorded in Fit. Can you please add Google Fit to the list of activity apps? I do not use a fitbit or smart watch at this time. Otherwise the app is top notch!
I've not used the diabetes education features. I'm happy that the app will capture the BG data while the bloody test strips is still in the meter. I just start the app immediately after testing.
Looks like a good app, bit it won't sync with my meter. I had minor problems with the original One Touch Reveal app, this is terrible.
This is a great app, but I wish that it would sync with the LOSEIT app like it does FITBIT and/or keep the food Input, it would save a lot of time. The coaching and information is GREAT.

(8/12/20 Update) Since the update to ver 1.5 build 132.1780, is way harder to enter data. Used to be able to do insulin and meds at same time, now you have to do one, go out, select other and then enter its value. Also, you can no longer enter insulin values higher than 99. If you take higher, you have to make 2 separate entries. The previous version was just starting to work well, now we're back to a screwed up app again. Will be dropping and moving to something else. Tired of this.

title: Livongo
description:
Livongo makes it easy to be healthy. Our tools, support, and guidance help you understand and manage chronic conditions like diabetes and high blood pressure while adopting the nutrition, exercise, and other lifestyle habits proven to help you live a healthier life.

The Livongo app works with the Livongo Blood Glucose Meter and Livongo Blood Pressure Monitor to give you a more detailed picture of your overall health. 

NEW! GET A LITTLE NUDGE AT JUST THE RIGHT TIME
Well-timed reminders can make a big difference. We’ll guide you to a healthier lifestyle with recipes, articles, tools, and more.

MESSAGE A COACH
Reach out to our expert coaches anytime. They can help you with healthy eating, activity, stress, medications, and more.

LOG YOUR FOOD
Track what you eat to help you build awareness, spot patterns, and stay accountable to your goals.

CONNECT WITH FITBIT OR SAMSUNG HEALTH
See all your steps data when you sync your Fitbit or Samsung Health account to the Livongo app.

PARTICIPATE IN 5-DAY CHALLENGES
You’ll take powerful steps toward your health goals with the help of quick, guided challenges on food, activity, stress, and more.

SEE ALL YOUR DATA IN ONE PLACE
Record every blood sugar, blood pressure, and weight reading, as well as daily steps counts, and view them all from one place in the app. You can gather insights, learn, and adapt your routine.

UNDERSTAND YOUR PATTERNS AND TRENDS
Our simple, easy-to-understand charts and summaries provide you with all the information you need to make the right choices to improve your health.

GET REAL-TIME FEEDBACK AND GUIDANCE
Personalized insights after every reading help you learn and improve. Our healthy tips and advice are always available.

ORDER TEST STRIPS WITH ONE TAP
We provide UNLIMITED strips and lancets sent to your door at no cost to you so that you never have unnecessary hiccups in your checking routine.

Livongo integrates with Google Fit, so you can import fitness data from Google Fit to Livongo.

ABOUT LIVONGO
Livongo has a vision of empowering all people with chronic conditions to live better and healthier lives.
