recentChanges:
When our members speak, we listen. Here’s a rundown of what’s new:
- See your LDL cholesterol values in the Livongo app when you connect your lab results (for eligible members).
- Edit the time of your meal in our Food Log feature.
- Minor bug fixes. :)
comments: This app/service is life changing! By taking daily metrics, dietary suggestions and specialized coaching, I've seen improvement in my health. My efforts in working with this app (and daily exercise/activities) has not only represented a change in diet but a change in lifestyle.

So far I have been able to track my blood pressure and my blood sugar levels, and see the results. I'm trying to sync my phone with the app for the steps, but it isn't working. Apparently I didn't understand that I needed a watch or some other device that sticks with me and links to the phone. I thought that it I had my phone in my hand it would track my steps. Besides this one, the last 2 sentences are new, unless I get a iwatch or Fitbit, I can't sinc with the app.

Extremely poor service and the app frequently fails to upload. When you say there is connectivity issues, you are told their map says you have service. It does not dawn on them it may be innaccurate for your specific location. There are difficulties in getting assistance. When one gets assistance, the file is not notated. I determined it is easier to use a traditional tester with Samsung health, than putz about with this flawed, time consuming app.

For the most part, the app is ok. But I didn't do one challenge and for some unknown reason, I haven't received anymore challenges. I don't always remember to post what I eat and I don't like that I can't put the actual times myself. I definitely like that it records my weight, though not particularly happy with the scale and I enjoy the tips.

The app and program was given to me at no charge by my insurance company and I feel like I still overpaid. The meter is 2 times the size of my accu check, the strips are huge and gives readings that it gives do not match my old meters or the one from my doctor (was over 20 points off with mutiple readings). If you are researching before signing up for the program dont waste your time.

title: Blood Sugar Tracker: Glucose Diary Average Records
description:
Blood Sugar Tracker: Glucose Diary Average Records is the health utility application for those user that might have been suffering from Diabetes. We have big plans for this app and look forward to making it as useful as possible to those trying to control their diabetes. Control your blood sugar level with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports. Add tags to each record – so with the help of diabetes logs you will find out your diabetes dynamics, for example, before meals, before breakfast, after lunch, after meals, In Morning, evening etc. With multi-profile support, track blood glucose level of other members of your family too. 

The application is designed to keep the complete track record of the user’s Blood sugar level. Since this data is very sensitive, we offer you a high level of data protection. Therefore, your health data is stored only where it belongs. Track your blood sugar and pulse history and save your blood glucose and pulse into a log to analyze and compare the entries. User can enter the blood sugar in application, the application will indicate that whether user’s Blood sugar level is normal, high or low. The user can maintain the record of Blood sugar and later can view the history in multiple forms as the user can view the records in statistical form. 

You can view statistics of Blood sugar / glucose level (minimum, average, and maximum), Blood pressure (minimum, average, and maximum) and Insulin daily dosage taken. Best app for recording blood glucose level.  Blood Sugar Information as the right tool to determine the blood glucose rating. The application has multiple options where user can set custom options for his/her convenience. The user can share these records with his/her doctor, user can export the records and create reports in various forms. Enter your blood sugar levels values first and press on calculate. The app shows different colors to let you know how good your blood sugar is. Measure Systolic and Diastolic BP, monitor Heart Rate Pulse.

title: BlueStar Diabetes
description:
*** BlueStar® is available via access code from your employer or health plan. ***

BlueStar® is an award-winning, FDA-cleared, in-app digital assistant, that provides tailored guidance in the moment. Achieve your diabetes health goals through BlueStar’s guidance, education, motivation, and accountability. 

FOCUS ON YOUR FOOD AND FITNESS:
● Sync with fitness trackers, pharmacy, lab, and patient portal 
● New integrations with more meters, blood pressure cuffs, and weight scales
● Healthy recipes, meal plans, lifestyle tips, and more
● Prompts about what to do next to stay on track

IMPROVE YOUR BLOOD GLUCOSE LEVEL:

CONNECTS TO YOUR CARE TEAM:

comments: Since installing this app. it has helped so much in not only tracking my progress, but also it has helped me to stay more focused with controlling my diabetes. I also want to give kudos to the BlueStar customer service staff, especially Leena. Whenever I've had an issue they have always had an answer. They are extremely knowledgeable, friendly and always very professional. Many yhanks to BlueStar and it's staff.. Felix Gonzalez

As a t1 diabetic, this app has impressed me. I can connect multiple types of glucose monitors, keep track of my meds, insulin, meals, nutrition, sleep, exercise etc. It's a great tool to use with your doctor and has so many other features that are very customizable and easy to use.
This incorpates all aspects of health information for managing diabetes.
Love the app! It's very helpful. I had fell off with using it regularly. Getting ready to start over
Easy to use and free

title: Blood Glucose Tracker - Diabetes Tracker
description:
Blood Glucose Tracker App helps track your blood glucose and diabetes, other health indicators are available like blood pressure, Medicine, Weight, etc.

We have created Blood Glucose Tracker - Diabetes Tracker app in such a way that you can track your health level and also in daily chart.

You can use this app to track Blood Sugar, Meal, Activity, HbA1c, Weight, Pulse, Blood Pressure, Oxygen Saturation and save data life time.

Data Tracker :-
Track your data in 2 features
1 - Timeline
2 - Log

Available Tags :-
happy, just woke up, falling asleep, excited, tired, sick, before the sport, after the sport.

Simple & User-Friendly design :-
The design of Diabetes tracker app has been made simple because the user can easily do his own Blood Glucose Tracker.

Available Therapy :-
Units = Blood Sugar in mg/dL and mmol/L
Meal = Carbohydrates, Carbohydrate Units, Bread Units
Meal-bolus-factor = CU factor, BU factor
HbA1c = Percent, mmol/mol
Weight = Kilogram, Pound
Correction factor available
You can change Basal rate

Data Backup And Import Backup :-
You can easily backup your data and easily import the backup.

Data export in PDF :-
You can export your data to date wise PDF and share it with doctor.

title: Apollo Sugar
description:
Diabetes is a condition that needs a comprehensive and holistic plan of action - constant monitoring, timely and high quality medication, appropriate diet, and physical activity to maintain normal blood glucose levels. We present the Apollo Sugar app – we are your end to end digital partner to take care of your health as a diabetic or pre-diabetic person. With this app, you have the full power of Apollo’s integrated diabetes care approach at your finger tips. Apollo Sugar app helps deliver superior and positive patient outcomes with glucose tracking, and self-management of blood glucose levels. Our approach is based on connected diabetes care and technology with a human touch that keeps you always in good hands and can help you achieve control of Diabetes (HBA1c, FF, PP). With this app, you can now access your Prescriptions, Lab Reports, and Vitals and get support whenever you need to understand these results and the related treatment plan. You also get to chat with a personalized Health Coach, get personalized educational information on diabetes, and access personalized tips and reminders on diet, medication compliance and activity tracking. Our app is a complete solution, a seamless extension of our expert clinics,  to enable you as a patient to comply with treatment, interact with health coaches, and maintain optimum blood glucose levels.
Advantages of Apollo Sugar App

Tracking patient’s daily health parameters.

Access your Prescriptions, Lab Reports, and Vitals

Manage exercise (steps walked/day), diet (diets logged/per day), and detect other lifestyle considerations (e.g. hours of sleep per day, typical active / inactive daily patterns of activity).

Improve compliance with medication and lifestyle modifications (e.g. inbuilt reminders for medication, diet logging, self monitoring of blood glucose)

Access health coaches (certified diabetes educators) at your finger tips – either thru app or dial a help line.

Provide constant support mechanism to prevent / protects from very low and high blood sugar levels.(i.e Hypoglycemia and Hyperglycemia)

comments: The App is good only parts. The prescriptions & lab reports are not uploaded promptly. Even after two years of consultation not a single prescription has been uploaded.This creates hardships in ordering medicines etc. Needs lots of improvements as an ongoing process.

title: TinyMedic
description:
tinyMedic is a modern diabetes app that makes it quick and easy to help track various aspects that can impact your blood glucose levels HB1AC, Cholesterol, Blood Pressure, Ketones, Body Weight etc. 

tinyMedic is the only app that is:
Entirely free with multiuser support! 
Enables the security to your data while volunteers (Community health workers) analyse and track the whole family
Allows to share the personalized dashboard  and full information to your doctor. 

FEATURES:

Designed for type 1, type 2 and gestational diabetes
Choice of international Glucose units (ADA, NICE, AACE, Custom)
Prepares a personalized dashboard that gives a quick decission making details to your doctor to keep the critical situations.

Input:
Quick and easy logging (blood glucose, HB1AC, Cholesterol, Blood Pressure, Ketones, Body Weight etc.)
Basic blood glucose tracking by type of event (before breakfast, before dinner, after lunch, etc.)
Number input with your keyboard or a convenient on-screen number pad
Backup all your glucose data to data a cloud service and keep all of your devices up to date.
Security:
Access to your data is secured by your mobile number. No one can access your data without your permission.
Multi user support
Secure access to the data of your family or loved ones.
Allow the community health workers to help track various aspects of your or your family.
A1C results: 
Either manyally enter your a1c test results for safe-keeping and analysis
Or allow tinyMedic to estimate HbA1c with an advanced HbA1c conversion calculator
Reminders;
Daily reminders: Get a notification at times you specify every day
Analysis:
Customizable Statistics of Daily, weekly and monthly analysis of various aspects and tags.
Assistant gives alerts and tips based on the analysis


Support:
Free support (average response time under 24 hours!)



Next version:
Targets: enter your target low and high blood sugar levels after discussing with your doctor.
Medication tracking: track your medication along side your blood sugar readings.
Notepad: take notes throughout the day. The next time you record a blood sugar reading, we'll add them to the notes for you.
Android Wear support: Reply to reminders by speaking your blood sugar into your smart watch

title: BG Monitor Diabetes
description:
*** Healthline's Best Diabetes App of 2018! ***

BG Monitor is a new diabetes tool, made for how you want to manage your diabetes. Blood glucose trends are identified to notify you of needed adjustments - saving you from staring at your logbook. Insulin is automatically calculated when you enter your blood glucose and food so that you can quickly get back to what matters most.

Finally, a diabetes app that's as smart as you.

TRACK EVERYTHING
Record your blood glucose, food, insulin, exercise, and more. Tag your entries to find them faster or take a picture of your meal to remember exactly what you ate.

SMART ANALYSIS
Gain insight into your numbers, without the work. Automatically identifies trends and notifies you if adjustments are needed.

DETAILED STATISTICS
Track your progress with comprehensive statistics and graphs. Filter your data and search by date to find exactly what you're looking for.

SEND REPORTS IN SECONDS
Don't waste time creating a spreadsheet. Instantly share reports of how you're doing with your doctor and loved ones.

BUILT FOR YOU
Dial in your targets and ratios to automatically calculate insulin for each meal. Supports both U.S. and international units of measurement (mg/dL and mmol/L).

GET THINGS DONE
Designed for speed so you can get back to what matters most. Create entries right from your home screen or record blood glucose directly from reminders.

Need help?
Visit https://www.bg-monitor.com/

Know another language?
Help translate at https://gowong.oneskyapp.com/collaboration/project?id=47648

comments: Great tool for diabetics, helps to keep all blood logs in one place. Also the auto counting feature for insulin and carbs is a great. One of the top apps out there. Update 2020: Found a major flaw with the app, when trying to export logs there is no option to add to email as a PDF ect. Also when exporting to google drive for example the data is discombobulated and unusable. Hopefully this gets fixed soon because without an exporting function the app becomes useless, which is a shame.

This app for recording BS, food intake, and insulin works great for me. Get the paid upgrade. It is well worth the money just for library of food carbs. The only thing I would like to see added is a simple operator"s manual. The 'Help Section' is useful, but could be expanded.

Jesus christ. This app auto selects part of your insulin and aims. If I took what this app suggests I would be dead! Not even close to being correct. A time when I can manually work out I need 18 units this all is telling me to take 32 units... uninstalled quickly.
The app is easy to use . Helps me see the ups and downs and I like that it figures out the amount of insulin I need.

Excellent app , has saved my son's fingers as it does what the expert meter used to do, but with this app I can just input his bg from his cgm without having to always finger prick. Thks for this app!

title: Intellin Diabetes Manager, Log & Risk Tracker
description:
Manage your diabetes, for free!

Intellin Diabetes Manager App. Log your diabetes blood pressure, blood sugar, insulin, glucose, activities and more!

Whether you have type 1 or type 2 diabetes, gestational diabetes, or want to track diabetes for a loved one, Intellin is the most comprehensive diabetes management app. The diabetes app empowers you to live well with diabetes and understand your diabetic risks of developing complications.

Track what matters most - blood sugar, blood glucose levels, blood pressure log, insulin dose, activity - all in one diabetes manager app. Intellin® Manage Diabetes provides personalised predictions on your highest diabetes risk areas and provides tips on how to prevent these diabetes complications.

☆ FEATURES☆
• Diabetes log:easily log your blood pressure, activity, body mass index, insulin dose, blood glucose levels and more
• Blood sugar tracker: see and manage blood sugar level trends
• Diabetic risk: understand your highest diabetic risk areas and how to manage them
• Diabetes tracker: get reminders and tips on how to look after your blood pressure, insulin, glucose, diet, exercise, feet, eyes, kidneys and cardiovascular risks
• Manage diabetes: manage your Type 1, Type 2, and gestational diabetes with motivating trends and feedback
• Diabetes management: daily, weekly, monthly and yearly diabetes analysis
• Secure diabetes data backup

☆ PRO FEATURES☆
• Try Intellin® Connect with a free one month trial!
• Connectivity to over 100 devices to track your activity, weight loss, BMI, blood pressure and more. With extra devices to be added to increase your ability to take control of your diabetes today! Easily manage your diabetes.
• Compatible with apps: Fitbit, Garmin, iHealth Labs, Misfit, OMRON, Oura Health, Polar, Strava, Suunto, Withings

The Intellin® Diabetes App was developed in the UK with passion from clinicians and people with diabetes.

SUPPORT

We're always working to make the Intellin® Diabetes Management App better, and we need your feedback! Please get in touch to help us improve the Intellin diabetes app and let us know how we can help people manage it at: hello@gendius.co.uk

Follow us on Twitter @GendiusHealth, Facebook @GendiusMobHealth, Instagram @Gendius_

title: Onduo for Diabetes
description:
The Onduo Diabetes Management Software Platform is intended to provide people with Diabetes Mellitus, their healthcare professionals, and care team a review, analysis, and evaluation of retrospective glucose data from compatible FDA cleared blood glucose meters and FDA approved continuous glucose monitoring systems in support of an effective diabetes management program. 

 The Onduo Diabetes Management Software Platform is not intended to provide treatment decisions nor is it to be used as a substitute for professional healthcare advice. 

 The Onduo app is only available for eligible individuals with Type 2 Diabetes enrolled in the Onduo program, which includes: 

 ● Access to a dedicated Care Team 
 ● Devices to track glucose and diabetes supplies at no cost to you 
 ● Simple, targeted strategies for improving your health that fit your life 

 About Onduo
 Onduo, a joint venture between Verily (an Alphabet Company) and Sanofi, was created to serve people living with diabetes. Parent companies Sanofi and Verily pooled their resources—over a century of diabetes innovation from Sanofi and the engineering and data analytics capabilities of Verily—to create an organization that would bridge the gap between medicine, technology and data. This combination of the best of evidence based diabetes care with novel technology is resulting in Onduo’s unique ability to make quality care more personalized, accessible, and affordable for the millions of people living with diabetes worldwide. 

 Featured content is for illustration purposes only. Actual app content and display format may vary.

There's no way to edit a log once you've made it. All logs are separate for whatever reason--so combining all moods, foods, sugar levels, etc. in one entry would be much more helpful rather than have a separate entry for everything. I couldn't find past logs until I looked under history, then under glucose, which makes no sense to me if I'm looking for moods or medications, but whatever. The coach is nice.

Great application. Medical advise and diabetic directions from a care provider. It even has the ability to video chat with a doctor specialized for diabetic care. I didn't have to leave my house! It links with my glucose monitor and provides reports to give to your PCP if needed. Honestly, not sure why I would go back to my PCP after this specialty treatment. Definitely recommend Onduo to anyone.

title: Glimp
description:
App for managing diabetes, compatible with Abbott Freestyle Libre, Libre Pro, MiaoMiao and BluCon sensors. Not compatible with USA 14-days Libre sensor.

Functionalities:
-Memorize blood glucose levels
-Acquires glucose values from Abbott Freestyle Libre sensor without Abbott reader
-Memorize insulin units, carbohydrates and sport activities
-Remote Glucose Monitoring via Dropbox and Nightscout
--Smartwatch app (requires an NFC-open smartwatch, see link:: https://github.com/pimpimmi/LibreAlarm/wiki/How-to-install-NFC-on-Sony-Smartwatch-3). 
-Continue glucose monitoring keeping the smarthpone in an armband positioned over sensor.

Notes for use with Abbott Freestyle Libre:
-You can use Glimp togheter with Abbott Freestyle Libre reader
-Verify that your mobile has NFC support and that NFC is enabled
-Keep Glimp open on the graph form
-Move back of mobile very near to the sensor
-Two short vibrations means reading OK
-One long vibration means error in reading
-No vibration means NFC missing or not active, or mobile too far from sensor
-New sensors must be initialized with Abbott reader before using them with Glimp
-With Glimp you don't have to wait one hour to start using a new sensor
-Glimp don't stop reading from sensor after expiry date, but don't guarantee accuracy of data. Use the sensor data at your own risk!
-Abbott Freestyle Libre Reader processes the sensor measurements and displays glucose values based on statistics, instead Glimp records and displays glucose values as they are read by the sensor

This app is not approved by Abbott and there's no guarantee about the correctenss of glucose values read from the Abbott Freestyle Libre sensor.
This app is not intended as a substitute for your doctor and diabetes specialist. For any questions, contact your doctor.

For any problem or question please send us an e-mail. We want to improve, but we can't do it without your feedback!

title: Sugar Tester App Info
description:
Take control of your diabetes with, quick tap using Sugar Tester App Info application. The simplest and easiest app to use in managing diabetes. Diabetes is a condition that impairs the body ability to process blood glucose or known as blood sugar. Without ongoing, careful management, diabetes can lead to a build of sugars levels in the blood, which can increase the risk of dangerous complications, including heart disease. 

Different kinds of diabetes can occur, and managing the condition depends on the type. Not all forms of diabetes stem from a person being overweight or leading an inactive lifestyle and some may be present from childhood.

The diffrent diabetes types are Type 1, type 2, gestational  diabetes, lada, mody and etc. However by changing your lifestyle you can lower your blood sugar levels naturally without any medication. Diet and lifestyle changes can reverse diabetes unlike medications which can only treat the symptoms. Make a positive changes to your daliy routine and the way you eat, sleep, stay active, and manage stress.

title: Sugar Test By Finger History
description:
Sugar Test By Finger History app is designed for those patients who are suffering from diabetes. User have to measure the Blood Sugar Level using Digital Glucometer and enter the values to maintain the record.

User can keep the history of Blood Sugar Level as the application analyze that whether Sugar Level is normal, high or low and indicate in insight section. The records section shows the data which user saved and can view history in multiple forms.

The user can save the data and later view the reports. The user can view the reports and later discuss these reports with your doctor. User will use this app with complete convenience with easy to use design.

Sugar Test By Finger History is an indispensable assistant for anyone with diabetes of type 1, type 2, or who have gestational diabetes. Diabetic people are advised to track their diet and maintain an constant weight so that they can manage their disease better.


Sugar Test By Finger History Features :-

- Add sugar values easily with just one touch blood glucose monitoring, hemoglobin levels, weight.

- User can set different Blood glucose level units - mg/dl or mmol/l.

- User interface is very good.

- View your sugar level graphs with different color stages.

Disclaimer:
Please note that this app does not measure your Blood Sugar it just saves the readings which you enter.

title: Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History
description:
Sugar is the word which we will use to describe the person how sweet he/she is, but that word sugar may harmful to human life also.
If a person takes food more than the limit regularly, sugar may affect the body. Sugar may cause because of Having more Rice, Having more Sugar, Having more sweets, Having more food, etc which is more than a limit.
Step 1: Download and install the app.
Step 2: Open the Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app and accept the Privacy policies of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app to get aware of the app is not going to misuse the user mobile data.
Step 4: After accepting the user will get into the Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app, and it will ask to allow Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app to access the device location, click on Allow.
Step 5: Next, it will ask to allow Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app to access photos, media, and files on user devices if required, click on Allow option and move into the app.
 After completing the basics steps of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app formalities use will enter into the Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app Menu, in Menu user will get options of Blood Sugar, Enter Sugar Values, Sugar Records, Rate and Share options.
Blood Sugar: Whenever the user selects the Blood Sugar option from Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app Menu, users will get more options for the Blood Sugar app. Those are
Health Tips:  In the Health tips option of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app, user will get Smoking effects , 7 strategies, Expected Sugar Levels, How to control body, Sugar Addiction, Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log Historyrmation, 10 Reasons, Glycated Hemoglobin, Fasting Sugar levels information to control the Sugar. And each step describes the how-to follow food habits and what not to do in regular life.
Sugar Levels: In the Sugar levels option of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app, user will get the options to see the statistics of Age 20 above, Age 20 below, Pregnant Women, Sugar Levels , Glucose Levels, Kids and Adults, At Risk Weight, Sugar Chart and Level Chart , by the options of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app user will get clarity about the statistics of Sugar levels in different age group so that people will aware about the effective stages of sugar.
World MAP: In the World Map option of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app, World Map, Death World, Top 5 Countries. World Map describes the statistics of Sugar affected people in the entire world, Diet World describes the Death rate of people due to sugar, and Top 5 describes the top 5 Sugar people countries list in  Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app.
Sugar Test: Sugar test of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app contains Blood Test, Low Sugar, and Ketone Levels, and Blood test describes Simple Blood test that can save your life. And Low Blood Sugar Levels 45-69 mg/dL and 205-3.8 mmol/L and How to test your Keynote level.
Diabetes; Diabetes of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app, contains tips to control the Sugar.
HbA1c as an indicator of Diabetes Control and some statistics will contains in the HbA1c option of Blood Sugar Calculator, Info, Dairy, Log History app.
Similarly, the app describes Type 2 Diabetes and its chart followed by Low Sugar causes and its statistics 
Sugar Test: Users will get an option to enter sugar values of Sugar Reading, Weight, Type 1, Before Mean, Change the date, and Change Reading option to store the records in every test.
Sugar Records: This app contains Sugar records of User to view stored records and view specific graphed records 
Best apps always encourage bale and sharable so please give a rating in rating option similarly share the app to your friends by clicking on share option.

title: BG Monitor Diabetes Pro
description:
Upgrade to BG Monitor Pro to unlock additional features and support development.

PRO FEATURES
• Complete insight details.
• Food database.
• Unlimited insulin types.
• Filter entries and statistics with tags.
• Automatic backups of data and settings.
• Automatic reminders to check BG after meals and out of range BG.

BG Monitor is a new diabetes tool, made for how you want to manage your diabetes. Blood glucose trends are identified to notify you of needed adjustments - saving you from staring at your logbook. Insulin is automatically calculated when you enter your blood glucose and food so that you can quickly get back to what matters most.

Finally, a diabetes app that's as smart as you.

TRACK EVERYTHING
Record your blood glucose, food, insulin, exercise, and more. Tag your entries to find them faster or take a picture of your meal to remember exactly what you ate.

SMART ANALYSIS
Gain insight into your numbers, without the work. Automatically identifies trends and notifies you if adjustments are needed.

DETAILED STATISTICS
Track your progress with comprehensive statistics and graphs. Filter your data and search by date to find exactly what you're looking for.

SEND REPORTS IN SECONDS
Don't waste time creating a spreadsheet. Instantly share reports of how you're doing with your doctor and loved ones.

BUILT FOR YOU
Dial in your targets and ratios to automatically calculate insulin for each meal. Supports both U.S. and international units of measurement (mg/dL and mmol/L).

GET THINGS DONE
Designed for speed so you can get back to what matters most. Create entries right from your home screen or record blood glucose directly from reminders.

Need help?
Visit https://www.bg-monitor.com/

Know another language?
Help translate at https://gowong.oneskyapp.com/collaboration/project?id=47648

recentChanges:
v8.0.1 - April 19, 2017
• Blood glucose trends are now automatically identified with Insights.
• New bottom navigation for quicker access to Entries, Statistics, Food, and Insights.
• Self-managed food database is now available for all users.
comments: This app has most of the basic data needed. Most people eat/drink the same things over the course of a week (i.e., milk) If these food items could be copied to the saved area or tagged somehow for quick selection. The food database could also have a seeable field for the brand names of products.
I've paid two times for this app. I went with this app for the easy use. The food data base sold me and it still doesn't work. It would be nice for some tech help to get this feature working.
Best app I've found to help calculate bolus as well as corrections and track carb consumption. Just with there was a basal function.

Revised--I don know what changed but I can no longer give this 5 stars. The daily, and thus 30 day average are now calculated incorrectly. Today for example I was 67, 167, and 119. Making the daily average 117. The app says after I put in the 119 that my daily went from 115 to 134.  This makes no sense and is incorrect. The 30 day on my meter is 112, same readings entered into the app and the app says 130. Very annoying. I'll be looking for a new app despite liking the other features.   I've been type 1 for 50 years now--this is the best program i have found so far--simple to use and only what's needed to help keep things in control.  Only wish it came combined  with a program like fit day that had food carb values so i only had to use one program.

I highly recommend this app. It is by far the best app I've tried for man aging my diabetes. I now have:  • an extensive database of foods I      eat that are cutomised to featuring my key information  • the ability to easily work out how much insulin to bolus as the app calculations are customised to match my known sensitivity variations throughout the day  • a graph tracking my trends making it simple to see if I need to make any adjustments for improved management of my blood glucose.  I have been using this app for several months now and it does everything I need it to. As a result I can make informed decisions which have improved my overall diabetes management markedly.

title: One Drop: Transform Your Life
description:
A diagnosis doesn't have to hold you back. 
 
Take back your time, your power, and your life with One Drop, the award-winning app that simplifies improving your health, so that you can reach your full potential. Work one-on-one with a personal coach, track all your health data in one place, and build better habits for life with a customized transformation plan backed by behavioral science.
 
Join our global community of nearly 3 million people living with diabetes, prediabetes, high blood pressure, high cholesterol, and other chronic conditions reimagining what’s possible with One Drop.
 
START YOUR DIGITAL MEMBERSHIP 
 
ONE-ON-ONE COACHING
Your personal coach is available to answer your questions, provide feedback, and offer encouragement. All One Drop coaches are certified health professionals with years of experience. 
 
INTERACTIVE CONTENT 
Backed by behavioral science, One Drop’s transformation plans are designed by experts with you in mind. Through engaging infographics, prompts, commitment pledges, articles, and quizzes, you’ll learn everything you need to know to change your habits for good. Personalized plans are available for people with diabetes, prediabetes, high blood pressure, high cholesterol, or any combination of them.
 
GLUCOSE PREDICTIONS & REAL-TIME ADVICE
If you have type 2 diabetes, AI-powered technology predicts your future blood sugar levels. Receive personalized recommendations, so you can prevent problems.
 
One Drop offers an auto-renewing monthly subscription to a Digital Membership for $19.99/month available for purchase in the app.
 
FREE FEATURES
 
HEALTH DATA TRACKING
Keep track of blood sugar, medications, food, activity, weight, blood pressure, and more—all in one place. Daily, weekly, and monthly views show how close you are to reaching your goals. 
 
WORLD’S LARGEST FOOD DATABASE
Search the library or scan barcodes to find foods. Build and save favorite meals for future use. Let One Drop count your carbs for you.
 
AUTOMATIC INSULIN PUMP BASAL RATES
Set up your basal rates to mirror your insulin pump settings. One Drop automatically logs and adds pump data to your daily insulin totals. 
 
HEALTH AND COMMUNITY NEWS
Visit the News tab for breaking healthcare news, delicious recipes, and inspiring stories from One Drop community members.
 
DIABETES SUPPLIES
 
SMART GLUCOSE METER
Sleek and compact, the One Drop glucose meter looks nothing like a medical device. Our Bluetooth-enabled meter wirelessly syncs readings with the One Drop app for simple blood sugar tracking. 
 
TEST STRIPS & LANCETS
Get everything you need, delivered right to your door. Use the One Drop app to request testing supplies or sign up for auto-shipments. No insurance or prescription required. 
 
Shop all products at joinonedrop.com/start
 
__________________________
 
Privacy Policy: https://onedrop.today/pages/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://onedrop.today/pages/mobile-eula

comments: This Apple really helps you check your calorie and carb intake and it has helped me to do rob my A1C from 15.2 to 7.8 I give this app a 4 stars the only reason it's not a 5 star is maneuvering through things that you have to find

Fantastic App! I would've given it 5 stars, but you can't save food if it has no carbs associated with the meal. I want to be able to log my water intake, as well as my calories, even if there are no carbs involved. Please fix this! It is an incredible app. I can print up reports for my primary care Dr, keep track of my activities, log meals, and so much more! Thank you!

I dont normally brag on anything. Apps dont generally impress me but its less aboit the app and more about the product and how mindful its made me on my health. I just purchased your bluetooth tester and connected my app 2 days ago. For the last year i have struggled to get my sugars under control again. I have woken up with mid 200s-300 sugars every morning for the last year. After only two days of tracking my health with tbis app i have woken up with the first time sugar of 96 since last year.
This app helps me keep track of my blood sugar and blood pressure thank you

title: Keto-Mojo Classic
description:
Tracking and viewing your blood glucose and ketone readings are easy with the Keto-Mojo Classic App. Instantly sync your test results from your Keto-Mojo meter to your smartphone. A simple and seamless connection from you meter to the app requires no additional formatting and no manual entries are required, although manual entries can be made. 

European meter models will also download your GKI values and the app will automatically calculate GKI with US meter models without the GKI function.

 · Filters allow you to review your data in a variety of formats.
 · View different graphs of your readings, with highs and lows for each day and your average over various time periods.
 · Add tags and notes to your readings. 
 · Filter your readings by tags and meters.
 · View your latest readings in the context in a dial format.
 · Set your glucose unit to either mg/dL or mmol/L.
 · Toggle from glucose to ketones to GKI, and scroll through past results.
 · Track Urine Ketone values from Urine Ketone Strips. Readings can be added manually.
 · Track Breath Ketone values with unites PPM and ACE. Readings can be added manually.
 · Upload your readings from the app to select health management platforms (including Apple Health) where you can your ketones and glucose alongside other health markers.
 · Securely upload your data to MyMojoHealth Cloud Connect where your data is stored on a HIPAA compliant server. 
 · Use MyMojoHealth to share your data with our many app partners.
 · Easily export all your readings in CSV format to share with your healthcare provider or store them as a backup that you can import later.
 · Synchronize your data across multiple devices.
 · Hide your unwanted readings. 
 · Keep track of your strip supply in the Supply manager and order more.
 · Unlimited storage ensures you never have to worry about upgrading capacity or losing heritage data.
can monitor glucose and ketone readings alongside other vital health metrics.
The app is compatible with the following Keto-Mojo meters:
 1. USA: GK+ meter, Bluetooth integrated meter or Bluetooth connector for older meter models, found at https://shop.keto-mojo.com/
 2. EUROPE: GKI-Bluetooth meter found at https://shop.eu.keto-mojo.com/
 Encrypted API connection ensures all your data is transferred securely.

· Track Urine Ketone values from Urine Ketone Strips. Readings can be added manually.
· Track Breath Ketone values with unites PPM and ACE. Readings can be added manually.
· Upload your readings from the app to select health management platforms (including Apple Health) where you can your ketones and glucose alongside other health markers.
· Securely upload your data to MyMojoHealth Cloud Connect where your data is stored on a HIPAA compliant server.
· Use MyMojoHealth to share your data with our many app partners.
· Easily export all your readings in CSV format to share with your healthcare provider or store them as a backup that you can import later.
· Synchronize your data across multiple devices.
· Hide your unwanted readings.
· Keep track of your strip supply in the Supply manager and order more.
· Unlimited storage ensures you never have to worry about upgrading capacity or losing heritage data.
can monitor glucose and ketone readings alongside other vital health metrics.
The app is compatible with the following Keto-Mojo meters:
1. USA: GK+ meter, Bluetooth integrated meter or Bluetooth connector for older meter models, found at https://shop.keto-mojo.com/
2. EUROPE: GKI-Bluetooth meter found at https://shop.eu.keto-mojo.com/
Encrypted API connection ensures all your data is transferred securely.
summary: The ketone and blood glucose monitoring system

comments: Was working great and really enjoy using the app to keep track of my data. However, it has stopped loading and just stays on blue screen since 10/27/20 update. I was able to open it this morning but then it crashed and won't open again. New fix coming soon again? I know there have been 2 recent updates.

Was working great until the last update. Looks like the update went in on October 22nd and that's when it started not loading the app for me anyways. Ever since the update it just hangs in the loading screen it does not go into the app. I was on the beta channel but reading reviews it looks like it's affecting a lot of other people. My device is a Samsung Galaxy Note 9+.

Update: I uninstalled and re-installed the App and it now opens up and syncs normally again. There was no option to update, only to uninstall and re-install. Previous Review: App Not Loading! I've checked for a few days now and the App won't open up beyond the initial blue screen. Please fix!

Similar to others, the app has challenges with sync. It is odd........(update): I uninstalled and reinstalled the app. So far, it appears to be working. Will test it a few more times over the course of the next week and see what happens.
I have the latest version 2.1.5 and the app simply won't open. I just get the blue "pretend like I'm gonna open and then don't" screen. Loved it before this last update.

title: SocialDiabetes. Take control of your diabetes
description:
SocialDiabetes helps you to control better your diabetes treatment with the convenience of carrying your logs directly on your smartphone. 

Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes care requires a lot of tracking. With SocialDiabetes, register all the  relevant information to your treatment such as blood glucose levels, insulin, carbs, medicaments or physical activity. 

🤳🏼FEATURES 

View your glycemic and insulin on board. Take a look at your diabetes progress and all the factors that might affect your glycemic. 


Combine the information, have a better comprehension of your diabetes. From New Log register:
-Glycemic
-Food
-Medication
-Activity
-A1c
-Weight 
-Heart Pressure 
-Ketones


👉 IMPORTANT: With a minimum of 3 blood glucose logs daily for 3 months, we will be able to calculate your estimated A1c.



⚙️TOOLS


It will help you with your daily diabetes calculations:


-Bolus calculator: with your insulin-to-carb ratio, insulin sensitivity factor, and glycemic targets. receive insulin dose recommendations. 


-Carb Calculator: from the nutritional database, select each food and calculate the number of carbs that you are going to eat, by grams or rations. 


-Food. Consult the number of carbs from different food and add new ones.
 

-Connect with your device. Your glycemic logs will go from automatically your Smartphone. Check our compatible devices. 


-Reports generation. On screen or download them.


-Connect with your health care provider (HCP). Your healthcare team can follow remotely your diabetes.


-Share information with your loved ones.


-View from your computer. Access to your account from our web-platform. 

📲INTEGRATIONS 

Glucose Meters: 

GlucoMen Areo 2K (solo con Android), GlucoCard SM.
Accu-chek Aviva Connect, Accu-Chek Guide.
Contour Next ONE.
CareSens Dua
AgaMatrix Jazz

Wearables:

Google Fit
Fitbit 

🏅AWARDS

-Award to most innovator product by E.U.  in 2017
- Recognized as the best health app by UNESCO - WSA
- International Mobile Premier Awards winner at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona

👓PERMISSION

- SocialDiabetes is a CE sanitary product es un producto sanitario, Directive 93/42/EEC, meet all maximum requirements for security and quality. 

- SocialDiabetes App is licensed by Menarini Diagnostics to use GlucoCard SM and Glucomen Areo 2K glucose measurements.


🙋🏻CONTACT

Have any problems or want to contact us?
Email us at support@socialdiabetes.com

Remember that to get better results we recommend you to follow up with your health care team. 

SocialDiabetes is created by people with diabetes for people with diabetes. It helps you with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes management to have a lifestyle that improves your health. 


www.socialdiabetes.com
www.facebook.com/socialdiabetes
www.twitter.com/socialdiabetes

title: Blood Sugar & Blood Pressure Tracker
description:
Maintain a data of your Blood Pressure, Blood Sugar & Heart Rate to keep track of it. This data can seen in graphical & statistical form.
It gives you a better understanding of your Blood Pressure, Blood Sugar & Heart Rate. Helps to foresee any future problems that may arise. You can see if your daily record are fluctuating or maintaining similar pattern of Blood Pressure, Blood Sugar & Heart Rate.
This data can also be useful for your doctor for better analysis of your problems. 
 
Features
    1. Add Manual Data ( Blood Sugar, Blood Pressure, Heart Rate )
		• Blood Sugar - Check your blood sugar before & after meal.
			Before Meal - Add your fasting sugar result.
			After Meal - Add your after meal 2hrs result.
		• Blood Pressure - Add your pressure results in
			Systolic
			Diastolic 
		• Heart Rate - Check your Heart Beat per minute.
			Heart beat Rate

			Gender

        - Last 30 days

        • Blood Pressure
        • Heart Rate
		
		
		Save your statistics and share it with your doctor or family or friends via any social media platform.

title: Glycemic Index Load in food net carbs diet tracker
description:
Glycemic Index & Load Diet Assistant is an app that lets you easily browse, search for, and display the Glycemic Index for different foods. The application also helps in keeping a body weight and blood glucose levels measurement logs. It also allows to track blood pressure and warns about too high levels of tension. You can also browse Glycemic Load and carbohydrates contents in foods. There's also a calculator of the Glycemic Load in a given serving. Knowing these values and following a low-carb diet like Montignac, Paleo, Atkins, low-GI and similar, helps avoid weight gain or obesity and lower the risk of diabetes, coronary heart and age-related health diseases.

Do you want to eat smart?

+ know good food
+ eat smart
+ follow low-carb diets or keto diets
+ control your weight
+ prevent diseases like diabetes or heart diseases like hypertension
+ fight weight gain, overweight and obesity
+ have the Glycemic Load, Index and carbs data always at hand
+ backup or sync with other devices

The free features of the app are:

+ Glycemic Index foods tables
+ Favorite and recent food + search feature
+ Weight tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Glucose tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Blood pressure diary with statistics and beautiful charts
+ BMI calculator

We keep this app free by showing ads. If you want to remove ads or utilize the other exciting features like below, you can have them for a small fee. 

+ Glycemic Load list
+ Carbohydrates content list
+ Fiber content in foods and net carbs calculator
+ Meal content calculator
+ Food diary to keep track of your food, glycemic load and carbs consumption
+ Statistics with averages for daily, weekly, monthly and yearly periods
+ Beautiful charts of the GL and carbs consumption over time
+ Weight tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Unlimited number of measurements
+ Future additions to the food tracker, charting and stats
+ Import/export all your data to/from cloud storage
+ No more ads!

So, do you know what you eat? Find out now! Install the app and use it to take control of your health.

GI means Glycemic Index. It is a number associated with a particular type of food to indicate the food's effect on a person's blood glucose (blood sugar) level. The number typically ranges between 50 and 100, where 100 represents pure glucose, an equivalent amount of pure glucose.

The Glycemic Load (GL) of food is a number that estimates how much the food will raise a person's blood glucose level after eating it. It can be used to apply the Glycemic Index to dieting by connecting the GI number with carbohydrates content in a given serving. It gives an estimation on how much a serving size of food is likely to increase blood-sugar levels.

Net carbs are total carbs minus fiber which is indigestible thus it is considered not to raise blood sugar levels.

BMI is used to assess health risks and body structure but does not take in consideration muscular mass so it can sometimes be inaccurate, for instance in the case of athletes or pregnant women.

Diabetes mellitus (DM), commonly known as diabetes, is a group of metabolic disorders characterized by high blood sugar levels over a prolonged period.

Hyperglycemia (also spelled hyperglycaemia or hyperglycæmia), is a condition in which an excessive amount of glucose circulates in the blood plasma.

Observational studies demonstrate that people who maintain arterial pressures at the low end of these pressure ranges have much better long-term cardiovascular health.

comments: Very quick and easy app to use. Very handy if you are watching sugar intake (diet, health, both). The free version shows the Glycemic Index of the food item, & it's all colour coded like traffic lights so very quick to scroll or search for the food you want - & see if it's a good choice! For those who want to eat a low-carb lifestyle and also watching the impact of carbs for health reasons, the app now includes the option to make a one time payment to see the Glycemic Load of food. I love it!
This app is in alphabetical order and easy to read. When I have a question about a food that I want to eat I check its glycemic load. I don't use it everyday but when I use it I know it's accurate.
Great Apps, for future ideas, you may use the phone camera, and users can just take a shot on the food, and it will automatically tells GI and GL number. :)
Very helpful and ease of use in identifying glycemic differences among a wide range of foods. Still loving this app.
Easy to use with the new Blood pressure addition completes everything you need all in one app.

title: MyDiabetes - Personal Diabetes Reversing Assistant
description:
MyDiabetes is personalized diabetes management and weight loss assistant. 
 
The app is created for people struggling with diabetes-related issues such as high blood sugar levels, weight gain, high cholesterol, and more.
 
Our program offers flexible customization while staying within the recommended amounts of carbs, sugar, cholesterol, and other essential metrics.
 
Our team of qualified nutritionists created these diabetes management plans to help you improve your health, lose weight, manage diabetes, and in some cases, even reverse the condition completely. 
 
We believe that every person deserves to live the best life possible. Therefore, we ensured that you would enjoy this diet without being forced to eat the foods you don’t like.
 
Our fitness professionals also prepared a list of exercises that you can do without any equipment. Boost your chances of achieving desired results, anywhere, anytime.
 
We work to cater to your successful transition into a healthier lifestyle and guide you along the way with 24/7 support. Try it out today and get ready for positive, life-changing results!
 
MyDiabetes Features
 
A PERSONALIZED MEAL PLAN 
Get a customizable meal plan that’s created to fit your body’s needs: your total calorie intake, recommended amount of carbs, sugar, cholesterol, and other vital metrics.
 
SHOPPING LIST FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE
Find all your meal plan ingredients faster and easier with a categorized weekly shopping list.
 
AT-HOME WORKOUTS FOR YOUR WELLBEING
Complete simple yet effective challenges or opt-out for a personal workout plan that’s entirely based on your preferences.
 
YOUR HEALTH’S PROGRESS TRACKER
Easily track your glucose levels, HbA1c, medications, and carbs in one place! Most importantly, use this data for your doctor checkups to ensure that your treatment plan keeps up with your condition. Track your steps and calories burned.
 
ACTIVITY TRACKER TO KEEP YOU ORGANIZED
Always stay up-to-date with your recent app activities. Track your daily meals, workout progress, and even water intake.
 
Disclaimer: Before making medical decisions, check with your doctor.
 
Terms and Conditions: https://mydiabetes.diet/general-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://mydiabetes.diet/data-protection-policy/

comments: I have been diabetic for 2 years, I am gaining more and more weight and fatigue even though I have been following the diet recommended by my doctor. Up until 2 months ago, I used this app. Amazingly, it helped me manage my diabetes
This app is a great tool to help me keep track of essential health indicators and help me lose weight. I was skeptical at first but it is super great, so convenient.
This brilliant app makes managing my diabetes a whole lot easier. I have suggested it to friends because I find it is a worthwhile tool to have .
Must have. Diabetes often has many dangerous complications, requiring regular monitoring to take appropriate measures. This is the definite app you must have if you have diabetes

Thank you very much. When the doctor informed me that I had type 2 diabetes, the first thing I thought about was to change my diet. I have been looking for a support application and MyDiabetes is the most outstanding one I have seen

title: Diabetes Tracker App: Blood Glucose & Cholesterol
description:
Diabetes Tracker App is a great, easy and most comprehensive tracker app for Android, helping people track and manage their diabetes or pre-diabetes, to keep track of blood glucose and control carbs. Whether you had diabetes for years, or you are newly diagnosed, or diagnosed with pre-diabetes.

When you have diabetes, your blood sugar (aka blood glucose) levels may be consistently high. Over time, this can damage your body and lead to many other problems. Our app manage blood glucose quick and easy logging.

Diabetes tends to lower "good" cholesterol levels and raise triglyceride and "bad" cholesterol levels, which increases the risk for heart disease and stroke. Studies show a link between insulin resistance, which is a precursor to type 2 diabetes, and diabetic dyslipidemia, atherosclerosis and blood vessel disease. In order to prevent heart disease and stroke its good to keep log of Cholesterol level. 

Use HbA1c conversion calculator to convert HbA1c to Average Blood Sugar Level. The HbA1c level in your blood indicates what your average blood glucose level has been in the past 2 to 3 months. Everyone, whether non-diabetic, pre-diabetic, type 1 diabetic or type 2 diabetic has some degree of sugar in their blood.

Diabetes Tracker App Features:

• Quick and easy logging (blood glucose, HB1AC, Cholesterol, Blood Pressure, Ketones, Body Weight etc.)
• Designed for both type 1 & type 2 diabetes
• Estimated HbA1c & HbA1c conversion calculator
• Choose Glucose Target (ADA, NICE, AACE, Custom)
• Reminders;
• Daily, weekly and monthly graphs and analysis
• Assistant gives tips and more
• Backup to Google Drive and export data to CSV
• Import from CSV
• Free support (average response time under 24 hours!)
• Accesibility features
• Opt-in to support diabetes research anonymously through the app
• 100% Offline work

title: Sugar Level Tracky
description: Blood sugar, or glucose, is the main sugar found in blood. The body gets glucose from the food we eat. This sugar is an important source of energy and provides nutrients to the body's organs, muscles and nervous system. The absorption, storage and production of glucose is regulated constantly by complex processes involving the small intestine, liver and pancreas.

title: Guardian Connect US
description:
Now there's a smarter way to manage your diabetes.

Introducing the Guardian™ Connect continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) system. The Guardian Connect system uses a tiny sensor to measure glucose levels in fluid just below your skin, every 5 minutes. It takes readings all day and night and sends them to your phone via a small wireless transmitter, so you can see how you're doing anytime.

With the Guardian Connect mobile app, you can see your most recent sensor glucose data and glucose trends over time. You can also receive alerts to notify you when you're going above or below your preferred range and keep track of daily events which may impact your glucose levels.

Your mobile app also sends your data to CareLink™ Personal diabetes management software, so you can see your full information online and share your information with family or friends. Those closest to you can even receive text messages whenever you go out of range.

To use the Guardian Connect system, you will need the Guardian Connect transmitter and Guardian Sensor 3, as well as this app. To learn more or purchase the Guardian Connect system, visit www.medtronicdiabetes.com.

IMPORTANT NOTE: This app will only work with Guardian Connect transmitter, which was specifically designed to communicate with your Android device via Bluetooth. This transmitter has the letters "GC" on the front. It will not connect to other Medtronic CGM transmitters, including the MiniLink and Guardian Link 3 transmitters.

See Important Safety Information for Guardian Connect CGM system at https://www.medtronicdiabetes.com/important-safety-information.

title: Blood Sugar Infos and Tracker
description:
This blood sugar conversion app will help you to convert your blood sugar from mg/dL to mmol/L and vice versa. Type the blood sugar value in mg/dL and press on conversion to convert the value to the mmol/L value. If you want to convert the blood sugar value from mmol/L to mg/dL then type the value in mmol/L and press on conversion.

Blood Sugar Test + Info and Advice is a handy app to Understand diabetes.
Blood Sugar or diabetes is a disorder of assimilation, use and storage of sugars brought by the diet. This translates into high blood glucose.

This is the health utility application for those user that might have been suffering from diabetes.


The application is designed to keep the complete track record of the user’s Blood Sugar. User can enter the Blood Glucose reading in application, the application will indicate that whether your Blood Glucose is normal, high or low. Best app for recording Blood Sugar readings MG/DL, MMOL/L & pulse rate. 

Diabetic people are advised to watch their diet and maintain an ideal weight so they can manage their disease better. Also monitor your blood pressure, body temperature, bmi, spo2 and cholesterol level in the body.

Blood Sugar Test + Info and Advice is a handy app to Understand diabetes.
Blood Sugar or blood glucose is a disorder of assimilation, use and storage of sugars brought by the diet. This translates into high blood Sugar.

Diabetes diary - will become an indispensable assistant for anyone with diabetes of type 1, type 2, or who have gestational diabetes. The glucose diary will allow you to track your regular hemoglobin, sugar (glucose) levels, pressure, insulin, and also add tags, medications, condition, and weight to each record. With the help of regular sugar log, you can observe trends in your blood sugars and decide on that information how can you treat it and also provide your doctor all necessary information for effective diabetes treatment. Use other bp tracker and bp journal apps like blood pressure checker to monitor & manage BMI of your body.

If you are a diabetic then the Blood Sugar Test Tracker and info app is exclusively designed for you. This application is your health partner as this application is designed to keep the record of Blood Glucose Level. This application is not only designed for someone who is diabetic but this application is equally effective for those user’s as well who not be facing diabetes. This application also save the Heart Rate (BPM) Pulse values along with the Blood Sugar Values in both MG/DL and MMOL/L. The application enables the users the setup the checker reminder so the user never forgets to check the blood sugar level with digital blood glucometer and store these values in the application. The application has easy and intuitive design which makes it even difficult for user. The application generates the reports on the basis of values, view the reports, statistics and analysis. This application maintains the user profile and user can modify the settings at any turn. We have big plans for this app and look forward to making it as useful as possible to those trying to control their diabetes. This app is created to provide you a great diary for your blood sugar and pulse and does not measure your blood sugar and pulse. All result values are random generated!


Disclaimer:
Please note that this app does not measure your Blood Sugar is just a handy app to Understand diabetes .

Blood Sugar Test Tracker and info is a easy app to convert your blood sugar test result either in mg/dl used by the American system or in mmol/L used by the British system which is accepted Worldwide.

title: Blood Pressure Tracker | BP Checker | BP Logger 20
description:
Manage Your Blood Pressure, Weight, BMI, Blood Glucose Level, Heart Rate, Sugar Level, spo2, bp & Diabetes at once by Free Blood Pressure App!

Control your blood pressure with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports your doctor will love and many other tools to analyze high or low blood pressure! 

Blood Pressure Checker Diary : BP Tracker History Log, Controls blood pressure & blood sugar level with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports doctor will love & many other tools to analyze high or low blood pressure value. Blood Pressure Control.

Control high blood pressure (i.e., Hypertension) with blood pressure monitor : bp checker app!

Features:
 
💚 Log blood pressure &  pulse readings using fast keyboard data entry
💚 Understand what the numbers mean &  monitor blood pressure trends with statistics &  interactive charts
💚 Send blood pressure PDF reports to your physician/doctor
💚 Set up reminders to take blood pressure measurements or medication
💚 Export or import blood pressure data in CSV format for easy data interchange with other applications e.g. Microsoft Excel
💚 Manage blood pressure records of multiple profiles (great for caregivers)
💚 Support for common blood pressure classification guidelines (ACC/AHA, ESH/ESC, JNC7)
💚 Keep your data safe with automatic backups to Google Drive
💚 Configurable date/time formats &  measurement units
  
Simple and Easy to use:
 
1. You can easily log and track systolic, diastolic and pulse by just swiping your finger.
2. You can easily add your tags (e.g., irregular heartbeat, cuff location like left/right arms, seated/reclined).
3. You can easily search your data (e.g., by date, tags, and bloodpressure zones).
Blood Pressure Diary : Evaluation Info Log History Tracker has been made for the people who need constant management for Blood Pressure, weight and blood glucose.

According to American Heart Association (AHA), normal range of blood pressure are Systolic 91 ~ 120 mmHg and Diastolic 61 ~ 80 mmHg. Please enjoy our blood pressure log and tracker app.


Organized:
- In order to be organized &  use hand sets for health, use specially designed - BP info tool. Add notes, postures, location along with body weight &  glucose with Blood Pressure - BP INFO.

History:
- Always have an access to older records with Blood Pressure Info App.

Trends:
- Can see trends on line graphs &  bar graph with date &  compare statistics on graph &  control High Blood Pressure.

Data Record:
- You are able to enter your BP, weight &  blood glucose data &  view those records in graphs &  lists.

Report:
- BP Journal App announces the analyzed changes &  the average value of total entered data in 7 days, 30 days &  60 days.

Goal setting:
- You are able to set the target for your Blood Pressure &  weight value.

Graph:
- You are able to view the measured data as a whole graph divided by year, month, week &  day.

Diary &  Memo:
- By entering a memo in the recorded data, you are able to record thought at the moment of measurement

Alarm:
- Do you keep forgetting to take the medicine? BP Diary provides a time alarm to take a medicine &  a notification.

Note: This app DOES NOT measure blood pressure nor Blood Pressure History. To measure blood pressure reliably, use a clinically-validated blood pressure monitor. It is not possible to measure blood pressure with fingerprint scanner on the smart phone.

Best app to track your health and to help you know more about ur bp.. great applications must try

title: Blood Pressure Checker Diary -BP Info - BP Tracker
description:
Manage Your Blood Pressure, Weight, BMI, Blood Glucose Level, Heart Rate, Sugar Level, spo2 & Diabetes at once by Blood Pressure App!

Blood Pressure Checker Diary : BP Tracker History Log, Controls blood pressure & blood sugar level with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports doctor will love & many other tools to analyze high or low blood pressure value. Blood Pressure Control.

Control your blood pressure with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports your doctor will love and many other tools to analyze high or low blood pressure! 

Control high blood pressure (i.e., Hypertension) with blood pressure monitor : bp checker app!
 
Features:
  
💓 Log blood pressure & pulse readings using fast keyboard data entry.
💓 Understand what the numbers mean & monitor blood pressure trends with statistics & interactive charts.
💓 Send blood pressure PDF reports to your physician/doctor.
💓 Set up reminders to take blood pressure measurements or medication.
💓 Export or import blood pressure data in CSV format for easy data interchange with other applications e.g. Microsoft Excel.
💓 Manage blood pressure records of multiple profiles (great for caregivers).
💓 Support for common blood pressure classification guidelines (ACC/AHA, ESH/ESC, JNC).
💓 Configurable date/time formats & measurement units.
  
Simple and Easy to use:
 
1. You can easily log and track systolic, diastolic and pulse by just swiping your finger.
2. You can easily add your tags (e.g., irregular heartbeat, cuff location like left/right arms, seated/reclined).
3. You can easily search your data (e.g., by date, tags, and bloodpressure zones).
Blood Pressure Diary : Evaluation Info Log History Tracker has been made for the people who need constant management for Blood Pressure, weight and blood glucose.

According to American Heart Association (AHA), normal range of blood pressure are Systolic 91 ~ 120 mmHg and Diastolic 61 ~ 80 mmHg. Please enjoy our blood pressure log and tracker app.

On this Blood Pressure APP your going to find:
- What is a normal blood pressure reading?
- What is the normal range for blood pressure?
- What is a dangerous level of blood pressure?
- What is the normal range for blood pressure in adults?

Note: This app DOES NOT measure blood pressure nor Blood Pressure History. To measure blood pressure reliably, use a clinically-validated blood pressure monitor. It is not possible to measure blood pressure with fingerprint scanner on the smart phone.

title: ApolloSugar - Health Coach
description:
Diabetes is a condition that needs a comprehensive and holistic plan of action - constant monitoring, timely and high-quality medication, appropriate diet, and physical activity to maintain normal blood glucose levels. We present the Apollo Sugar app – we are your end to end digital partner to take care of your health as a diabetic or pre-diabetic person. With this app, you have the full power of Apollo’s integrated diabetes care approach at your fingertips. Apollo Sugar app helps deliver superior and positive patient outcomes with glucose tracking, and self-management of blood glucose levels. Our approach is based on connected diabetes care and technology with a human touch that keeps you always in good hands and can help you achieve control of Diabetes (HBA1c, FF, PP). With this app, you can now access your Prescriptions, Lab Reports, and Vitals and get support whenever you need to understand these results and the related treatment plan. You also get to chat with a personalized Health Coach, get personalized educational information on diabetes, and access personalized tips and reminders on a diet, medication compliance, and activity tracking. Our app is a complete solution, a seamless extension of our expert clinics,  to enable you as a patient to comply with treatment, interact with health coaches, and maintain optimum blood glucose levels.
Advantages of Apollo Sugar App

Tracking a patient’s daily health parameters.

Access your Prescriptions, Lab Reports, and Vitals

Manage exercise (steps walked/day), diet (diets logged/per day), and detect other lifestyle considerations (e.g. hours of sleep per day, typical active/inactive daily patterns of activity).

Improve compliance with medication and lifestyle modifications (e.g. inbuilt reminders for medication, diet logging, self-monitoring of blood glucose)

Access health coaches (certified diabetes educators) at your fingertips – either through the app or dial a helpline.

Provide constant support mechanisms to prevent/protects from very low and high blood sugar levels. (i.e Hypoglycemia and Hyperglycemia)

title: Blue Circle Diabetes
description:
*THIS APP IS MADE BY DIABETICS*

Blue Circle Diabetes is an online community of diabetics and our app helps you intelligently log your blood sugars, insulin, food, meal photos and activities through the day.

- Tracker for your vitals.
- Engage with the local diabetes community through events and meetups.
- Sync and connect with Glimp, Libre pro and Miao Miao automatically.
- Add followers that receive notifications when you are high or low.
- Generate reports based on your data.


Our purpose at Blue Circle Diabetes Foundation is to destigmatize diabetes and create a safe space for people with type 1 and type 2 diabetes.

Find and connect with us here:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bluecirclediabetesfoundation/
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/bluecirclediabetesfoundation/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bluecirclediabetesfoundation/

Email: support@bluecircle.foundation


If you like what we do, please do rate and leave a review!

summary: Blue Circle Diabetes is an online community. Our app helps you manage diabetes.
recentChanges: Minor Update to the buddy project UI.
comments: The app is very helpful in being mindful of every little thing you consume, every dose you administer and every time you exercise, as you log it all in. Seeing the time in range on a daily basis gives you a good reality check, rather than getting it every couple of months.

Awesome app. I use this regularly to log my BG levels, meals, insulin and exercise.. whenever I use the Freestyle Libre Pro sensor, I can automatically link the Glimp app to synch results here. The reports, and the "Follow" feature are a huge plus. Blue Circle team periodically keeps adding many new features that I and other users have requested for which makes it all the more valuable. If you or your loved ones are living with Diabetes (Type 1, Type 2, LADA or any other), download the app now!

Amazing app to manage diabetes! I am a t1 since 10 years and was always searching for a decent app to manage my sugar levels Now, i am able to share my blood sugar with family, Log my meals, exercise and sugar levels......And the best part is the reports i can generate in the app! This app has definately made my life simpler! :)

My daughter is t1 since 2.5 years. usually she takes tresiba at 9:30 p.m. but yesterday we forgot to give her insulin. At 10:00 p.m. when I was updating the Bg and insulin dose in Bluecircle app, I suddenly remembered that she hasn't taken insulin so I immediately woke her up and gave her the insulin... I am very much thankful to this bluecircle team. This is really helpful for I get to know the average blood sugar of a single day and I can work on where I am lacking.

An app made by Diabetics, for Diabetics. The perfect app to help in Diabetes management. It covers all the aspects that you would need- logging your blood sugars, insulin intake info, meal pictures, compatible with Glimp as well and generates reports that could be shared with your doctor.

title: My DiabetesConnect
description:
We are proud to introduce worlds first complete diabetes care app, My DiabetesConnect(Diabetes is not just about blood glucose)!
 
My name Dr Ryizan Nizar MD MRCPUK and I am determined to make diabetes care more accessible and affordable to everyone.

Where you live or what you earn should not determine the Diabetes care you get!

This App offers people the opportunity to store and track their health data for a small yearly subscription. It will also graph all your data and show what your targets are as well as your current standing in relation to such targets.

My DiabetesConnect will do all the thinking for you.
 
The dashboard:- With this one screen you can see an overview of your diabetes control with colour-coded tiles that change colour to indicate which aspects need urgent action/above target/at target. The tiles will also notify when a certain test is overdue. Now you are in complete control.

PDF Reports:- Create and share PDF reports with your doctor in an instant. This will help your doctor make more informed decisions by analysing all your records over months/years.

Blood Glucose Screen:-This app has meal specific targets and you can instantly know if a certain blood glucose reading is high with the App's easy to understand colour coding. Readings will go red if it needs immediate attention, amber if high and green if in target.
 
BMI Screen- App will auto calculate your target weight once you enter your height and you will be able to easily see your progress in achieving these target.
 
HbA1c Screen:- Track your HbA1c over several years and you can easily track your progress, after all, Diabetes is all about trends.
 
Blood Pressure:- Now it's easy to track your blood pressure with My DiabetesConnect, know when it is too high and you can see trends over months/years.
 
Kidney Function (Blood test):- Track your kidney function overtime to make sure they are healthy. See the trends and know early if kidney function is deteriorating.
 
Kidney Function(Urine test):- Often this is the first sign of trouble that would indicate diabetes is starting to affect your kidney. Knowing early can help your doctor treat early and prevent/delay kidney failure.

Cholesterol:- Track your cholesterol over months/years. It's all about trends.

Eye and Feet Check:- Keep a track of your eye and feet screening. The App will remind you when you are due for your next eye appointment.

Medication:- Now you can keep track of all your medications with this one App. What's more, you can also store all your stopped medications so your doctor knows what you had been on before. that didn't work.

Diagnosis:- Keep track of all your diagnoses.
 

SUPPORT:
We're always working to make the My DiabetesConnect App better, and we need your feedback! Have a problem, criticism, question, or praise? Get in touch:
 
Email: support@mydiabetesconnect.co.uk
WhatsApp: Technical support can be accessed within the App.
WebSite: https://mydiabetesconnect.uk
Facebook: @diabetesRN
Instagram: @mydiabetesconnect
 
 
Terms and conditions:
https://www.termsfeed.com/terms-conditions/144bfc4620e851d4e9d46b228fa15ad0

 
###
 
My DiabetesConnect: Try it free for 3 months and then ONLY £2.99 a Year(Or you can continue with the free version)
